English: In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio.

English: A binary number can have only one of two values, i.e. 0 or 1, and these numbers are referred to as binary digits - or bits, to use computer jargon.
Igbo: Otu akara ọnụọgụ abụọ nwere ike inwe naanị otu n’ime mbamuru abụọ, ya bụ 0 ma ọ bụ 1, ma a na-akpọ akara ndị a dị ka ọnụọgụ keọnụọgụ abụọ - ma ọ bụ bits, iji asụsụ mpụiche kọmputa.
English: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
Igbo: biko cheta na ebe ina aga izute bu n’ezie ogige eliri otutu ozu, dika kwa nwere ihe-oputara ana agaghi agutali onu nye okere onu-ogugu uwa putara-ihe
English: The Great Pyramid at Giza is the only one of the seven wonders that is still standing today.
Igbo: Oke Piramid na Giza bụ naanị nke ka kwụ taa n'ime ihe itụnanya asaa ahụ.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: It was to last for the next 40 years and would be fought for real, by proxy armies, on battlefields from Africa to Asia, in Afghanistan, Cuba and many other places.
Igbo: O kwesịrị ịnọru ruo afọ iri anọ na-abịa abịa ma a ga-alụkwa ya n'ezie, site n'aka ụsụụ ndị agha nnọchite, n'ama agha site n'Afrịka ruo Eshia, n'ime Afghanistan, Kiuba na ọtụtụ ebe ndị ọzọ.
English: "They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night.
Igbo: Ha na-adị oyi karịa gburugburu ha n'ehihie ma dị ọkụ karịa n'abalị.
English: Such things have become separate disciplines, which focus on providing solutions to real life problems.
Igbo: Ụdị ihe ndị ahụ aghụọla nkebi ọzụzụ ndị iche, nke na-agbado anya na-enye ụmụ azịza maka ụmụ nsogbu keụwa dị ire.
English: Twentieth century research has shown that there are two pools of genetic variation: hidden and expressed.
Igbo: Nnyocha na narị afọ nke iri abụọ egosipụtala na enwere ụdịrị genetik variyeshọn abụọ: nke zoro ezo na nke pụtara apụta.
English: All things considered, we should not be surprised if our own ancestors solved their "protein problem" in somewhat the same way that chimps on the savanna do today.
Igbo: Eleghị anya, ya atụla anyị n'anya ma ọbụrụ na ndị nna nna anyi ji aka ha gboo "mkpa protin" ha n'usoro dị ka nke enwe bi n'ọhịa si eme taa.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.
Igbo:'}]
label: Dr. Ehud Ur, ọkammụta nke ọgwụ na Mahadum Dalhousie nọ na Halifax, Nova Scotia na onye isi oche nke ngalaba ụlọ ọgwụ na sayensi ahụ nke Òtù Ọrịa Shuga ndị Kanada dọrọ aka na ntị na nnyocha ahụ ka nọ n’oge ndị mbụ ya.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:

English: Even traditionally, though, not all Sámi have been involved in big scale reindeer husbandry, but lived from fishing, hunting and similar, having reindeer mostly as draft animals.

English: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria.
Igbo: Pastrị ndị Jamini dị nnọọ mma; na Bavaria, ọ na-enwe ọtụtụ ihe ma dịkwa iche iche ka nke ndị Ọstrịa, agbata obi ha n'akụkụ ndịda.

label: N'ụbọchị Mọnde, Sara Danius, onye odeakwụkwọ Nobel kọmitii maka akwụkwọ agụmagụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Swidin, kwuputara n'ihu ọha na ihe omume redio na Sveriges Redio dị na Swidin, mgbe o siere kọmitii ahụ ike inweta Bob Dilan gbasara mmeri na ihe nrite Nobel na mpaghara Akwụkwọ agụmagụ nke afọ 2016 o nwetara, na ha ahapụlarị mbọ ha na-agba inweta ya.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.
Igbo: Ụdị ụmụaka a ka a na akpọ ndị azụghị azụ. Ọtụtụ ụmụaka an na azụghị azụ abụrụla ndị ndị mmadụ jituru ejitu (ọ na abụkarị ndị mụrụ ha); oge ụfọdụ ngharịpụ ụmụaka bụ maka ọjụjụ ntụpọ dị na ahụ nwatakịrị ahụ a na ahụ anya maọbụ ntụpọ dị n' akọ n'uche ya.
English: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions.
Igbo: NextGen bụ otu sistemụ FAA na-asị ga-enye ụgbọ elu òhèerè ife site n’ụzọ kara pee mpe ma chekwa ọtụtụ nde galọnụ nke mmanụ kwa afọ na mkpọfụ anwụrụ.
English: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
Igbo: N'otu aka ahụ, site n’inwe otu visa Schengen, ị kwesịghịzi itinye akwụkwọ maka visa otu n’ime mba ndịòtù Schengen nke ọ bụla iche, ya mere chekwa oge, ego na mmepe akwụkwọ.
English: Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more.
Igbo: Na mbido izu a, helịkọpta ndị uwe ojii kpọkasịrị gbuo mmadụ atọ ma merụọ mmadụ atọ ọzọ ahụ.
English: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce.
Igbo: Onye nchịkwa Amamikpe n'ihu ọha, Kier Stama QC, kwuru okwu n'ụtụtụ a ikwusa amamikpe Huhne na Pryce.

English: There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike.

English: Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise.

English: Apia was founded in the 1850s and has been the official capital of Samoa since 1959.
Igbo: E kepụtara Apịa n'afọ ndị 1850; kemgbe 1959, ọ bụ isi obodo Samoa.

English: It is obvious enough that the world has changed much because of humankind's scientific and technological advancements, and problems have become greater because of overpopulation and mankind's extravagant lifestyle.

English: In developed countries you seldom hear similar levels of complaints about water quality or bridges falling down.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Prides are made up of one to three related adult males, along with as many as thirty females and cubs.
Igbo: Mpako gasị bụ otu ruo atọ ụmụ nwoke tozuru oke metụtaranụ mejupụtara ya, yana ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ ya dị ọtụtụ dị ka iri atọ.
English: Subsistence agriculture is agriculture carried out for the production of enough food to meet just the needs of the agriculturalist and his/her family.
Igbo: Ugbo oru bu ihe oru ugbo bu nke eweputara iji meputa nri ga ezuru ndi mmadu choro ya ma obu ya na ulo ya.
English: Alloys are basically a mixture of two or more metals. Don't forget that there are many elements on the periodic table.
Igbo: Ụmụ alọị bụgodu mwurikọta ígwè abụọ ma ọ bụ karịa. Echefula na e nwere ọtụtụ njìmebe nọ na tebụlụ pirịọdik.
English: He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth.
Igbo: Ọ nọbu n'ụlọ ọgwụ Jems Pajet dị na Gret Yamawụt.
English: If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ị chọrọ ịnọ nso na emereme ahụ ị ga-ekwesị ịbanye ọsịịsọ iji nweta otu ebe a na-ama ụlọikwu nọ nso n'egwu ahụ.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.
Igbo:'}]
label: Layton arịọla maka mgbanwe nye akwụkwọ iwu gburugburu ebe obibi nke ndị otu ọdịkaọgadị mgbe ya na PM nwere nnọkọ, na-arịọ maka "ndezigharị zuru oke nke zuru ezu" nke iwu gburugburu ebe obibi nke ndị otu ọdịkaọgadị

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
Igbo: Nhọrọ ndị ọzọ gụnyere Foto Kacha, Onye nhazi, Ọrụ nkiri fiim, Nhazi Kọstuum, Ọrụrụ fiim, Exigbo Egwu fiim Mbu, Nhazi mmeputa, Ọrụrụ Ụda, Mwụghari Ụda na Ezigbo Mmemme mbu.
English: Virtual team members often function as the point of contact for their immediate physical group.
Igbo: Ndịòtù òtù kedịnuche na-arụkarị ọrụ dị ka ebe nzute mbụ maka òtù ozugbo ha keanahụanya.
English: Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear.
Igbo: Ndị mkparịta ụka nwara ịweta udo, mana ihe ndị mkpọrọ chọrọ edoghi anya.
English: But regardless of his discovery, Eskimo tribes were already living there at the time.
Igbo: Mana n'agbanyeghi nchọpụta ya, agbụrụ Ezkimo ebirilarị ebe ahụ n'oge ahụ.
English: Large areas further north are quite sparsely populated and some is nearly uninhabited wilderness.
Igbo: Ebe ndị buru ibu na ngapụga ugwu bụ ọzara nke obere ndị mmadụ bi ma ụfọdụ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ebe ndị mmadụ ebighị.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.
Igbo:"}]
label: Kemgbe gọọmenti weere ọnọdụ ịkwụ ụgwọ ụlọ ọgwụ Mersey na Devọnpọt, Tasmania, gọọmenti steeti na ụfọdụ ndị ome iwu gọọmenti etiti ekwuola okwu megide omume a sị na ọ bụ mere mere n'ihu maka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị gọọmenti etiti na-abịa na Nọvemba.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron.
Igbo: Na aka-ugwu ma gburu-gburu dikwa nso igaru di obodo ihunanya na itunanya Sintra bukwa nke emere amara-amara nye ndi mba-ozo ka akowaputara idi-ukwu ya n’uzo egbuke-egbuke site na-aka Onye-nwe Byro.
English: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
Igbo: N'otu aka ahụ, site n’inwe otu visa Schengen, ị kwesịghịzi itinye akwụkwọ maka visa otu n’ime mba ndịòtù Schengen nke ọ bụla iche, ya mere chekwa oge, ego na mmepe akwụkwọ.
English: These couples may choose to make an adoption plan for their baby.
Igbo: Di na nwunye ndị a nwere ike ịhọrọ ime atụmatụ mkpọta nwa maka nwa ha.
English: Subsistence agriculture is a simple, often organic, system using saved seed native to the ecoregion combined with crop rotation or other relatively simple techniques to maximize yield.
Igbo: Ịkọ ọrụ ugbo bụ ihe dịcha mfe, ọtụtụ mgbe nke ndụ, sistèm n'iji nkpụrụ echekwara bụ nwa afọ na mphaghara ebe obibi ahụ ejikọtara ya na nghagharị mkpụrụ ma ọ bụ usoro ndị ọzọ dị mfe iji mee ka ọmịmị kachasị.
English: Women did the cooking in the yard; stores were just open counters looking into the street. Stone was used for building houses.
Igbo: Ụmụ nwanyị siri nri na mbara eze; ụmụ ụlọ ahịa wụbụ naanị ọgụego mepere emepe na-elefe anya n'okporo ámá. E jire okwute maka ịrụ ụlọ.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.
Igbo:"}]
label: Mana Prime Minista John Howard ekwuola na ihe a mere bụ naanị ka ichebe ụmụ akụrụngwa nke ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ site n'aka mwedàta siri n'aka gọọmentị Tasmania, n'inye mmezi nke nde AUD$45.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.
Igbo: Ndị ose foto ahụ mechara nọchie otu agadi nwanyị dịka ọ gara ụlọmposi. A gbagburu Mendoza.
English: Regional and seasonal severe weather phenomena include blizzards, snowstorms, ice storms, and dust storms.
Igbo: Ihe ihu igwe siri ike na-eme na mpaghara na n'oge ụfọdụ gụnyere blizadị, oke ikuku na ọdịda ibubeoyi, oke ikuku na ọdịda aịzị, na oke ifufe na-ebu aja.
English: The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.
Igbo: A ga-ezìga ozī nyocha nke nkata akpara n'otu weebụsaịtị ọha.
English: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.
Igbo: Egwuregwu Jimnastik nke mba USA na ndi USOC nwere otu ebumnobi - ime egwuregwu jimnastik, na ndi ozo, enweghi iyi-egwu dika ike kwere nye ogwu egwu isoro nro ha n’uzo n’enweghi iyi-egwu, ziri-ezi na gburu-gburu akwadoro akwado.
English: It is obvious enough that the world has changed much because of humankind's scientific and technological advancements, and problems have become greater because of overpopulation and mankind's extravagant lifestyle.
Igbo: O doro anya nke ọma n'ụwa agbanweela nnukwu n'ihi ụmụ ọganihu nke sayensị na teknụzụ nke ụmụ mmadụ, ma ụmụ nsogbu adịla nnukwu karịa n'ihi ọnụọgụgụ mmadụ karịrị akarị na ibifụga ndụ ókè nke ụmụ mmadụ.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
Igbo:"}]
label: Dika obere akwụkwọ akụkọ kachasị ohuru si kwuo, ogugu oke osimiri gosiri na oke ikuku malitere. O doro anya na enwere oru oke ikuku na mpaghara Pago Pago na Niue.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Also between each dynasty was an unstable age of divided provinces. The best-known of these periods was the Three Kingdoms epoch taking place for 60 years between the Han and the Jin Dynasty.
Igbo: Nakwa n’etiti usoro ndị eze ọ bụla bụ otu oge ejighị n'aka mke mpaghara ndị kewara ekewa. Oge ndị a nke a kacha mara amara bụ oge nke Alaeze Atọ nke mere ruo afọ iri na isii n'etiti Usoro Ndị Eze Han na Usoro Ndị Eze Jin ndị ahụ.
English: Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages.
Igbo: Ndị nnọchi anya ndị njem na-enyekarị ụmụ ngwungwu na-agụnye nri ụtụtụ, nhazi ụzọ esi eje njem ịga na/site na ọdụ ụgbọelu ma ọ bụ njem ụgbọelu etikọrọ ọnụ ya na ụmụ ngwungwu họteelụ.
English: Some atoms have unstable nuclei which means that they tend to break apart with little or no nudging.
Igbo: Ụfọdụ atọm nwere nukei na-anọsighị ike nke pụtara na ha na-agbajikarị n'iji obere ma ọ bụ n'enweghị akwamaka.
English: Virtual teams are held to the same standards of excellence as conventional teams, but there are subtle differences.
Igbo: A na-ebugowe otu egwuregwu ndị a na-ejighi n'aka n'otu ụdị ụkpụrụ mmapụrụiche dịka otu egwuregwu ndị nke a ma ama, mana ndịiche dị n'etiti ha nke n'eweghi anya.
English: No child should ever have to grow up in an environment that is not nurturing, caring, and educational, but they do.
Igbo: Ọ dị mma ka nwatakịrị tolite na gburugburu ebe a na-adịghị elekọta, elekọta, na agụmakwụkwọ, mana ha na-eme ya.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.
Igbo:"}]
label: O nweghị nnukwu mmebi ma ọ bụ mmerụ ahụ akọrọna n’ime Tonga, mana e were ọkụ nwa oge, nke a kọrọ gbochiri ndị ọchịchị Tongan ịnata ịdọ aka na ntị maka ajọ ebili mmiri PTWC ahụ nyere.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Ancient China had a unique way of showing different time periods; each stage of China or each family that was in power was a distinctive dynasty.
Igbo: Chaịna ndị mgbe ochie nwere ụzọ pụrụ iche igosi oge afọ; ogo ọbụla nke Chaịna ma ọ bụ ezinụlọ ọ bụla nọbụrụ n’ọchịchị wụbụ oge ọchịchị eze pụrụ iche.
English: During the struggle for independence organised by the Mau movement, a peaceful gathering in the town resulted in the killing of the paramount chief Tupua Tamasese Lealofi III.
Igbo: N'oge mgba maka nnwereonwe nke a haziri site n'aka ngagharị Mau, otu nzukọ keudo n'ime obodo rụpụtara n'ogbugbu nke ezigbo onyeisi Tupua Tamasese Lealofi III.
English: The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died.
Igbo: E bugara onye ahụ na-ese fòto na Ụlọ Ọgwụ Reagan UCLA, ebe o mechara nwụọ.
English: Two popular content theories are Maslow's Hierarchy of Needs Theory and Hertzberg's Two Factor Theory.
Igbo: Uzo-echiche ihe-di_n’ime abuo ama ama bu uzo-echiche ogogo nke mkpa nke Maslow na uzo-echiche ihe abuo kpatara nke Hertzberg.
English: The strategy proved effective, cutting off vital military and civilian supplies, although this blockade violated generally accepted international law codified by several international agreements of the past two centuries.
Igbo: Atụmatụ ahụ rụrụ ọrụ ọfụma, na-ebepụ ụmụ ihe mbute ihe ndị agha na ndị nkiti dị oke mpka, n’agbanyeghị na mgbochi a dara iwu mba ụwa anabatara n’izugbe nke ọtụtụ nkwekọrịta n’etiti mba ụwa nke afọ narị abụọ gara aga nyere ikikere.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.
Igbo:"}]
label: Ụlọ akwụkwọ iri na anọ na Hawaii ndị nọ na ma ọ bụ na nso akụkụ mmiri bụ ndị e mechiri na Wenezdee niile na-agbanyeghị ndọ aka na ntị niile ewepụrụ.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Neurobiological data provide physical evidence for a theoretical approach to the investigation of cognition. Therefore it narrows the research area and makes it much more exact.
Igbo: Ozi ihe-omumundu-banyere-uburu ewetala akaebe ana ahu anya maka usoro kowaputa nye nyocha nke nkota. Nihi ya obelatala ogbe nchoputa ma mee ya kpom-kwem nke ukwu karia.
English: NASA's shuttle program chief N. Wayne Hale Jr. said the foam had fallen "after the time we are concerned about."
Igbo: Onye isi ihe mmemme shọtụl NASA bụ Wayne Hale Jr. kwuru na fom ahụ dara "mgbe oge anyị na-ele anya gasịrị."
English: They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa).
Igbo: Ha nwekwara ike idobere gị ohere a ma ọ bụrụ na ị ka chọrọ oge ịtụgharị uche na ya maọbụ ịnweta akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ maka ebe ị na-aga (ọmụmaatụ: visa).
English: Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space.
Igbo: Afọ ọ bụla, a na-emerụ ọtụtụ ndị nleta ahụ n'ihi na ha enyeghị ezigbo ohere. Ụmụ anụmanụ ndị a buru ibu, azụghịazụ, ma nweekkwa ike ịbụ ihe ize ndụ, ya mere nye ha ohere.
English: A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables.
Igbo: Curry bu nri eji ngwa nri nke di iche iche esi, ana etinyekwa ya anu ma o bu akwukwo nri.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.
Igbo:'}]
label: Onyeisiala mba Amerịka bụ George W. Bush nabatara ọkwa ahụ.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole.
Igbo: Na mbụ, ọtụtụ n’ime ndị na-anya na-eyi akpụkpọ ụkwụ ọnyịnya ndị nwere kọị kọị na okpuru dị nrọ ma pee mpe.
English: People now write messages on computer screens, never having to come close to a sharpener.
Igbo: Ndị mmadụ na-edezi ozi na ihuenyo kọmputa gasị, o nweghị mgbe ha na-enwe ịbịaru nso na otu ọmụ nkọ.
English: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa.
Igbo: Mba Sawụtụ Afrịka emeriela Ọl Bụlaksị (Nuu Ziilandị) n'egwuregwu rọgụbi nke Mbanaatọ n'ama egwuregwu Royal Bafokeng nke dị na Rọstenbọgụ, Sawụtụ Afrịka.
English: Although Winfrey was tearful in her farewell, she made it clear to her fans she will be back.
Igbo: N'agbanyeghi na Winfrey bu anya mmiri n'okwu ije ọma ya, o mere ka ndị ihe ya na-amasị mata nke ọma na ọ ga-alọghachi.
English: Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.
Igbo: Akụkọ ụfọdụ sịrị na mmadụ asatọ nwụrụ, ma akụkọ gọọmenti sị na ihe ruru mmadụ iri atọ merụrụ ahụ; ma na amatabeghị ọnụ ọgụgụ ikpeazụ.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."
Igbo:'}]
label: Gọdọn Jọndro onye na-ekwuchitere Bush okwu kpọrọ nkwa Nọt Koria bụ "nzọụkwụ dị oke mkpa na ịnweta mwepụ were anya nke ngwa agha nuklia ndị Koria."

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: At the beginning dress was heavily influenced by the Byzantine culture in the east.
Igbo: Na mbido, ọ bụ usoro ejiji ndị Byzantium n'ọwụwa anyanwụ ka onye ọbụla na-eso.
English: In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed.
Igbo: N'ebe ụfọdụ isi mmiri n'ọkụ ruo otu nkeji ezuola, n'ebe ndị ọzọ achọrọ ọtụtụ nkeji.
English: The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna.
Igbo: Okwu bụ safari n’ojiji ama ama pụtara ime njem n’ofe ala ileleanụ ọhịa Afrịka dị ịtụnanya, tụnadị na savanna.
English: Ironing damp clothes can help them dry. Many hotels have an iron and ironing board available for loan, even if one is not present in the room.
Igbo: Ide akwa butụ mmiri nwere ike inyere ha aka ịkọ. Ọtụtụ ụlọ nkwarị akụ nwere otu igwe ndetị akwa na bọọdụ ide akwa dị adị maka mgbaziri, ọbụlagodi ma otu anọghị anọ n'ime ụlọ ahụ.
English: Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains.
Igbo: Obodo ochie nke Smyrna na mbụ, ọ bụzi ugbu a otu ebe na-ewi ewi, mepere emepe, na azụmaahịa dịnọrụ, e wubere gburugburu otu nnukwu ọnụ mmiri ma ụmụ ugwu gbaakwa ya gburugburu.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.
Igbo:"}]
label: Oke ifufe nke iri abụrụ aha nke oge oke ifufe Atlantik, Oke ifufe akpọrọ Jeri, gbakọrọ n'oke osimiri atlantik taa.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
Igbo: A na-ama ọkwa mgbedum na Metro naanị na asụsụ Catalan, mana mmesasị nke a na-emeghị atụmatụ ya bụ ndị a na-ekwuputa site na sistemụ akpaghị aka n'ọtụtụ asụsụ dịgasị iche iche gụnyere Spanish, English, French, Arabic na Japanese.
English: Machu Picchu consist of three main structures, namely Intihuatana, the Temple of the Sun, and the Room of the Three Windows.
Igbo: Machu Picchu nwere ọdịdị atọ, ya bụ Intihuatana, Ụlọ Nsọ nke Anyanwu, yana Ime ụlọ nke Windo Atọ.
English: The Babylonians built each of their gods a primary temple that was considered the home of the god.
Igbo: Ndị Babịlọn rụrụ otu n’ime chi ha otu isi ụlọ nsọ nke e were ka ebe obibi chi ahụ.
English: Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status.
Igbo: Ụmụ nwanyị: Ọ bụ ihe akwadoro na ndị njem nwanyị ọ bụla kwuo na ha alụọla dị, n'agbanyeghị etu ọnọdụ ha dị n'ezie.
English: In the archipelagos and lakes you do not necessarily need a yacht.
Igbo: Na otu agwaetiti n’umu ọdọ mmiri ị gaghị achọriri ụgbọ mmiri.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.
Igbo:"}]
label: Ụlọọrụ Etiti na-ahụ maka Ajọ ifufe (NHC) kwuru sị n’oge a Jeri abụghị ihe iyi egwu nye ala.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.
Igbo: Mkpesa mbụ kwuru na achụghachiri ụgbọelu ahụ azụ gawa Afghanistan mgbe anapụrụ ya ikikere ịfedà na mberede n’Ürümqi.
English: There were no large forests in the land of Canaan, so wood was extremely expensive.
Igbo: O nweghị ụmụ ọhịa buru ibu n’ala nke Keenan, ya mere osisi na-ada oke ọnụ.
English: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War.
Igbo: Dọkumentị ahụ, na-ndabere na ohihiahụ, ga-arụnye aka na ụmụ mgbagha oke ala ndị ahụ, nke Palestaịnụ chọrọ na-ndabere n’ụmụ oke ala tupu Agha Mideast 1967 ahụ.

English: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.

Igbo: Mgbe e tinyere ngwaọrụ niile dị adị n’ọrụ n’ụzọ bara uru n’ime ngalaba niile na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọọrụ ọbụla, nrụpụta ihe na amamihe pụrụ iche ga-enwe ike puta ihe.
English: Workers must often get their superiors' approval for any decisions they make, and are expected to obey their superiors' instructions without question.
Igbo: Ndi oru kwesiri inweta nkwado onye isi ha maka mkpebi obula ha ga ekpebi, ha kwesikwara irube isi n’ozi o bula onye isi ha ziri ha n’ajughi ajuju.

English: They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected.
Igbo:"}]

English: Examples include control, planning and scheduling, the ability to answer customer diagnoses and questions, as well as handwriting recognition, voice and face.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

English: Examples of on-site activities include hunting, fishing, photography, bird watching, and visiting parks and studying information about the ecosystem.

English: Vatican City's population is around 800. It is the smallest independent country in the world and the country with the lowest population.
Igbo: Onu ogugu ndi mmadu obodo Vatican di nari 800. O bu obodo kacha nta n’uwa n’uwa n’uwa na obodo n’ogbe ndi kacha pere mpe.
English: The cities of Harappa and Mohenjo-daro had a flush toilet in almost every house, attached to a sophisticated sewage system.
Igbo: Ọ fọrọ obere ka ụlọ niile dị n'obodo Harappa na Mohenjo-daro nwee mpochi mmiri, ya na usoro mkpopu kara aka.
English: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
Igbo: Alaeze Atọ so n'otu n'ime ọgbọ kacha dị egwu n'akụkọ ihe mere na mba Chaịna mgbe gboo. Puku kwuru puku mmadụ nwụrụ n'agha ịnọ n'oche ọchịchị nke kachasị elu na nnukwu obi eze nke dị na Xi'an.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.

English: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations.

English: In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love.
Igbo: Na ntọala, Buddhism Tibet dị ezigbo mfe. Ọ mejupụtara Yoga Kundalini, ntụgharị uche na ụzọ nke ịhụnanya nnabata-ihe niile.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables.
Igbo: Curry bu nri eji ngwa nri nke di iche iche esi, ana etinyekwa ya anu ma o bu akwukwo nri.
English: The great pyramid was created to honor the Pharaoh Khufu, and many of the smaller pyramids, tombs, and temples were built to honor Khufu's wives and family members.
Igbo: Arụrụ oke piramid iji kwanyere Eze Khufu zugwu, ya na ọtụtụ piramid obere ndị ọzọ, ebe olili na ụlọ ofufe arụrụ ịkwanyere ndị inyom Khufu na ezinụlọ ya ugwu.
English: They can see very well in the dark with night vision, and move very stealthily, too. Ocelots hunt their prey by blending in with their surroundings then pouncing on their prey.
Igbo: Ha na-ahụ ụzọ nke ọma n'abalị, ma na ejegharịkwa na nzuzo karịa. Oselọotụ na agwakọta onwe ha na gburugburu ha iji nwude anụ ha na achụ.
English: The moisture on your hands will react with the outer layers, which will feel funny and form a sort of shell.
Igbo: Mpụta ya na mmiri dị gị n'aka ga-enwe mmekọrịta, nke ga-enye gị mmetụta dị aghaa ma mepụta ihe dị ka ọkpụkpụ mkpuchi.
English: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.
Igbo: Duval, bụ onye lụgoro nwanyị ma mụta ụmụ abụọ bụgoro okenye, a hapụghịrị Mila onyere akọọrọ akụkọ nnukwu ihe nlere anya.

label: Onye ọgụ egwu Sanju Sharma bidoro na mgbede, Jai Shankar Choudhary were sote ya. Ọ gụkwara chhappan bhog bhajan. Onye ọgụ egwu Raju Khandelwal sonyekwara ya.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: With two years of the end of the war, the former allies were now enemies and the Cold War began.
Igbo: N'etiti afọ abụọ nke nlụcha nke agha ahụ, ndị mba bụbu ndị mmekọrịta bụzi ndị iro ugbu a ma Agha Oyi ahụ bidokwara.
English: The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.
Igbo: A ga-agba egwuregwu ikpeazụ nke ogbe a n'Elis Pak na Johanesbọg n'izu na-abịa abịa, mgbe ndị Sprịngbọks ga-agba Ọstrelia.
English: The strategy proved effective, cutting off vital military and civilian supplies, although this blockade violated generally accepted international law codified by several international agreements of the past two centuries.
Igbo: Atụmatụ ahụ rụrụ ọrụ ọfụma, na-ebepụ ụmụ ihe mbute ihe ndị agha na ndị nkiti dị oke mpka, n’agbanyeghị na mgbochi a dara iwu mba ụwa anabatara n’izugbe nke ọtụtụ nkwekọrịta n’etiti mba ụwa nke afọ narị abụọ gara aga nyere ikikere.
English: After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich.
Igbo: Ka akara omume pụtara, Gingrich kelere Santorum, mana ọ gwara Rọmni okwu ike, n'ihi ụdịrị mkpọsa ozi ọ kpọsara megide Gringrich na Ayowa.
English: The Giza Plateau, or "Giza Necropolis" in the Egyptian Valley of the Dead contains several pyramids (of which the great pyramid is the largest), several small tombs, several temples, and the great Sphinx.
Igbo: Ala ugwu Giza maọbụ "Giza Nekropolis" nke dị na ndagwurugwu ọnwụ Ijipt nwere ọtụtụ piramid (nke piramid ukwu bụ nke kachasị ibu), ọtụtụ ebe olili, ọtụtụ ụlọ ofufe nakwa oke Sfinks.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans.
Igbo:'}]
label: Lakkha Singh wee bido idu n'ịbụ abụ bajan gasị.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: The original population hasn't changed at all, they still need the same adaptations as before.

English: A binary number can have only one of two values, i.e. 0 or 1, and these numbers are referred to as binary digits - or bits, to use computer jargon.
Igbo: Otu akara ọnụọgụ abụọ nwere ike inwe naanị otu n’ime mbamuru abụọ, ya bụ 0 ma ọ bụ 1, ma a na-akpọ akara ndị a dị ka ọnụọgụ keọnụọgụ abụọ - ma ọ bụ bits, iji asụsụ mpụiche kọmputa.
English: If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ị chọrọ ịnọ nso na emereme ahụ ị ga-ekwesị ịbanye ọsịịsọ iji nweta otu ebe a na-ama ụlọikwu nọ nso n'egwu ahụ.
English: We perceive the Foster Care System to be a safety zone for these children.
Igbo: Anyị na-ahụta Ụkpụrụ Nlekọta anya ahụ ka ebe n’enweghi ihe iyi ndụ egwu nye ụmụaka ndị a.

label: Efere 108 nke Chhappan Bhog (na okpukpe Hindu, ihe erimeri 56 dị iche iche, dị ka, swiiti, mkpụrụ osisi, akị, nri dị iche iche wdg. Nke e ji achụrụ chi aja) ka e ji wee nye Baba Sham onyinye.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.
Igbo: Ụzọ mkpachapụ anya ha n’ime mgbochi, ka ha si ejide bọọlụ ma ụzọ nhàzi pụrụ iche mere ha ka ha pụọ iche ma o doro ha anya n’òtù a bụ òtù ha ga-emeri.
English: There may be more maria on the near side because the crust is thinner. It was easier for lava to rise up to the surface.
Igbo: E nwere ike nwekwuo marịa ọzọ n'akụkụ ya dị nso n'ihi na krọstụ ya kara taa ahụ. Ọ kara dịrị mfe maka lava ịrịgote n'elu ya ahụ.
English: People have known about basic chemical elements such as gold, silver, and copper from antiquity, as these can all be discovered in nature in native form and are relatively simple to mine with primitive tools.
Igbo: Ndị mmadụ amarala maka isi kemịkalụ njìmebe ndị dị ka ọlaedo, ọlaọcha, ọla kọpa sitere na oge ochie, dị ka enwere ike ịchọpụta ihe ndị a n’ụwa n’ụdị mbupụtaụwa ma dịrị mfe igwupụta n’iji ngwaọrụ ndị mgbe ochie.
English: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.
Igbo: Otu bọmbụ gbawara n'isi ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii n’ime Gaziantep, Tọkii ụtụtụ ụnyaahụ na-egbu ndị uwe ojii abụọ ma merụọ ahụ ihe karịrị ndị mmadụ ọzọ iri abụọ.
English: For example, “learning” and “socialization” are suggested as important motivations for Internet use (James et al., 1995).
Igbo: Maka ọmụmaatụ, “mmụta” na “mkpakọrịta” bụ ndị atụnyere dịka mkpalite dị mkpa maka ojiji Ịntanetị (James na ndị ọzọ., 1995).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Using ships to transport goods is by far the most efficient way to move large amounts of people and goods across oceans.
Igbo: Iji ụgbọ mmiri ebughari ngwa ahịa bụ ụzọ kachasị mma n'ezie iji buru ọtụtụ ndị na ọtụtụ ngwa gafee oke osimiri.
English: While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is "bien élevé" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier.
Igbo: Mgbe nke a na-abụkarị naanị nhụnuche na-ezighị ezi, ụzọ kachasị mma iji na-aga n’ihu n’ime Parii bụ na ị nọ n’omume gị kachasị mma, na-eme ka onye bụ "bien élevé" (a zụrụ nke ọma). Ọ ga-eme ka ngagharị n’ebe ahụ kara dị mfe.
English: Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
Igbo: Tagzi ekere eke bụ ụzọ dị ọsịsọ ma maa mma iji gaa ebe dị nso, dịka Paro (Nu 150) na Punakha (Nu 200).
English: The willingness of governments to issue passports with gender not stated (X) or documents updated to match a desired name and gender varies.
Igbo: Ịdị njikere ndị ọchịchị inye akwụkwọ ikike ngafe ndị a na-edepụtaghị jenda ha (X) maọbụ dọkụmentị emelitere ka ọ daba n’aha a chọrọ ma jenda adị iche.
English: On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called "Operation Dragoon".
Igbo: N'ụbọchị nke iri na ise nke ọnwa Ọgọọstụ n'afọ 1940, ndị enyi busoro mpaghara ndịda nke Frans agha, akpọrọ nke a "Operation Dragoon".
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.

Igbo:'}]
label: Na nguputa isi okwu ubochi Tozdee maka Ihe ngosi Egwuregwu Tokyo, onye isi Nintendo Satoru Iwata kpughere controller design ulo oru ya maka njikwa ohuru Nintendo Revolution.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
Igbo: Ndị nchọcha sitere na Mahadum Princeton dị na mba Amerịka na Mahadum Uppsala dị na mba Sweden kọwara ụdịdị ọhụrụ pụtara na naanị ọgbọ abụọ, ọ bụ ezie na ụkpụrụ a ka e chere na ọ na-ewe oge karịa, n'ihi ọmụmụ n’etiti otu ụdị nnụnụ bụ Dawin Finchi na-ebi otu ebe, Jiospiza Fọtisi, nakwa Kakụtus Finchi si esi bata, Jiospiza konirostrisi.
English: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
Igbo: Na nnwale PALM, eji ZMapp mere ihe nruba ama, nke a putara na ndi sayentist jiri ya mee baseline tunyere ogwugwo ato ozo.
English: If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na esị n'elu ịnyịnya tụpụ onye na-anya ya mana ụkwụ onye ahụ ekonye n'ekike ịnyịnya, ịnyịnya nwere ike ịsekpụrụ ya na-aga ma ọ gbaa ọsọ. Iji belata ihe egwu a, enwere ụfọdụ ihe mkpachapụ anya enwere ike ime.
English: The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture.
Igbo: Ndị Guaraní bụ otu amaala kachasị gbaa ọkpụrụkpụrụ bi n'eba a na-akpọ ugbua Ọwụwaanyanwụ Paragụwa, ha na-ebi ka ndị dinta na-awagharị awagharị ma na-arụkwa ọrụ ugbo mmepụta nri nke onwe.
English: Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: "Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola," he said.
Igbo: Onye nkwuchite maka Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman kwuru: "Angola na-agaru maka ntiwapụ ya kacha njọ mgbe ọ bụla ma ọnọdụ ahụ ka dịkwa njọ n’ime Angola,” o kwuru.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Although wagonways merely consisted of parallel planks of wood, they allowed horses pulling them to achieve greater speeds and pull larger loads than on the slightly more rough roads of the day.
Igbo: Agbanyeghị ụmụ ụzọwagọn nwere naanị ogwe osisi nọ n’akụkụ n’akụkụ, ha nyere ụmụ ịnyịnya na-esere ha òhèrè irute ekwomọsọ ndị karịrị ma sere ibu kara dị ukwuu karịa n’ụmụ ụzọ nke ụbọchị ahụ ndị karịtụrụ dị ike ike.
English: Thousands of years ago, a man called Aristarchus said that the Solar System moved around the Sun.
Igbo: Ọtụtụ puku afọ gara aga, otu nwoke a kpọrọ Aristarchus kwuru si na Usoro Mbara Igwe nọ na-agagharị gburugburu Anyanwụ.
English: Sadly, as newer methods of writing have emerged, the pencil has been relegated to lesser status and uses.
Igbo: Ọ bụ ihe mwute na ka ụzọ ọhụrụ e si ede ihe na-apụta, 'ọkwa', mkpịsịodee ọkpọọ bụzi ihe a tụlagara n'akụkụ anaghịzikwa eji ya ede ihe mgbe niile.
English: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.
Igbo: Ka akara Rossby na-adị obere karịa, ka arụmarụ na-adịkwu obere nke kpakpando n’ikwanye ugwu nye ụmụ ntụgharị nke ihendọta.
English: Some atoms have unstable nuclei which means that they tend to break apart with little or no nudging.
Igbo: Ụfọdụ atọm nwere nukei na-anọsighị ike nke pụtara na ha na-agbajikarị n'iji obere ma ọ bụ n'enweghị akwamaka.

English: Although Winfrey was tearful in her farewell, she made it clear to her fans she will be back.
Igbo: N'agbanyeghi na Winfrey bu anya mmiri n'okwu ije ọma ya, o mere ka ndị ihe ya na-amasị mata nke ọma na ọ ga-alọghachi.

English: The terrified King Louis XVI, Queen Marie Antoinette their two young children (11 year old Marie Therese and four year old Louis-Charles) and the King's sister, Madam Elizabeth, on the 6th October 1789 were forced back to Paris from Versailles by a mob of market women.

English: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you).

Igbo: 34 nime-otu-nari-nile bu ndi tinyere aka na ntuli aka ahu n’enwe otu uche ahu, n’acho ka Eze-nwanyi Elizabeth II buru onye eze nke ikpeazu nke Australia.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Suits are standard business attire, and coworkers call each other by their family names or by job titles.
Igbo: Suutu uwe azụmaahịa izugbe, ma ndị ọrụ ibe na-akpọ onye ọ bụla site n'aha ezinụlọ ha ma ọ bụ site n'aha ọrụ ha.
English: However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head.
Igbo: N'agbanyeghị nke a, onye ọkwọ ụgbọ merụrụ ezigbo ahụ n'isi.
English: With two years of the end of the war, the former allies were now enemies and the Cold War began.
Igbo: N'etiti afọ abụọ nke nlụcha nke agha ahụ, ndị mba bụbu ndị mmekọrịta bụzi ndị iro ugbu a ma Agha Oyi ahụ bidokwara.
English: The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.
Igbo: A ga-agba egwuregwu ikpeazụ nke ogbe a n'Elis Pak na Johanesbọg n'izu na-abịa abịa, mgbe ndị Sprịngbọks ga-agba Ọstrelia.
English: On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.
Igbo: N'aka nke ọzọ, ụmụ ọnọdụ okwute mmiri na sinoo bụ ihe nkịtị n'ọtụtụ mba, ma ụmụ ụgbọala na-anyagharị n'enweghị nsogbu afọ niile.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race.
Igbo:"}]
label: Nke mbụ ya bụ Slalom ahụ, ebe o ritara otu Agbachaghị n'ọsọ mbụ ya. Mmadụ 36 n'ime 116 sọrọ mpi ahụ nwetara otu ihe ahụ n'ọsọ ahụ.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.
Igbo: Ndị otu mgbanyụ ọkụ mechara gbanyụọ ọkụ ahụ ebe 11:35 nke abalị.
English: While project based learning should make learning easier and more interesting, scaffolding goes a step beyond.
Igbo: Dịka ọmụmụ dabere n’arụmarụ kwesịrị ime ka ọmụmụ kara dị mfe ma na-adọkwu mmasị, ịkụ skafoldu gakwuru otu ụzọụkwụ n’ihu.
English: If you only go ashore using shipboard excursions you will not need a separate visa (as of 2009).
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ị nọ n'ụgbọmmiri eme njem nlereanya nke naanị elu ala ị gaghị enweta visa dị iche maka ya (bidori na 2009).
English: Unfortunately, studying traffic flow is difficult because driver behavior cannot be predicted with one-hundred percent certainty.
Igbo: Na mwute, ịmụ maka otu okporo njem si aga siri maka na e nweghi ike ikwu kpọm n'ọgụ otu narị pasentị ụdị omume ọkwọ ụgbọ nwere ike ime.
English: The Great Pyramid at Giza is the only one of the seven wonders that is still standing today.
Igbo: Oke Piramid na Giza bụ naanị nke ka kwụ taa n'ime ihe itụnanya asaa ahụ.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary.
Igbo:"}]
label: N'ọsọ ya nke ọzọ, Giant Slalom, ọ gbachara dị ka onye nke iri n'otu ụmụ nwanyị nọ ọdụ ebe oge ọsọ ya niile bụ nkeji 4: 41.30, nke ji nkeji 2: 11.60 nọrọ n'azụ onye nke mbụ Claudia Loesch onye Austria ma jiri nkeji 1: 09.02 nọrọ n'azụ Gyöngyi Dani onye Hungary gbara onye nke itoolu.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC!
Igbo: Egwuregwu ski eteela ọ nọ — ụmụ eserese esere n'ọgba kemgbe 5000 BC na-egosi ndị egwuregwu ski!
English: The main Amazon River is 6,387 km (3,980 miles). It collects water from thousands of smaller rivers.
Igbo: Isi osimiri Amazọnụ dị km 6,387 (maịlị 3,980). Ọ na-ewetaju mmiri site n’ọtụtụ puku osimiri ndị kara di obere.
English: This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.
Igbo: Ebe a bụ ebe ndị nchịkwa mba si Britenụ were dịka nke ha ya mere ọ bụrụ na ị na-achọ maka akaebe nke nchịkwa ókèala ahụ gara aga, ebe a bụ ebe dị mma ịmalite.
English: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout.
Igbo: Nri ndị Majorca, dị ka nke ndị mpaghara ndị yiri ya n'ime Mediterranean, na-adabere n'achịcha, akwụkwọ nri na anụ (tụmadị anụ ezi), ma na-eji mmanụ oliv mgbe niile.
English: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.
Igbo: Etinyere ọtụtụ nnukwu igwe onyonyo n'ọtụtụ ebe na Rom, ka ndị mmadụ nwee ike kirie mmemme ahụ.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.
Igbo:"}]
label: Skiers anọ nwanyị nọ n'otu ụmụ nwanyị dara ịgbacha ọsọ ha, na 45 n'ime skiers 117 nọ na Giant Slalom dara isonye na ndị gbatara ihe n'egwuregwu ahụ.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Chambers, an agnostic, argues that his lawsuit is "frivolous" and "anybody can sue anybody."
Igbo: Chambers, onye na-ajụkarị oge niile, na-agbagha na ikpe ya "abaghị uru" ma "onye ọ bụla nwere ike ịkụ onye ọbụla ikpe."
English: During these periods fierce warfare took place between many nobles fighting for the throne.
Igbo: N'oge ndị a, a lụrụ ọtụtụ agha n'etiti ndi ukwu na-azọ oche eze.
English: An example is visiting, photographing, and learning about organgatuangs in Borneo.
Igbo: Otu ọmụmaatụ bụ ileta, ise fòto, na ịmụta gbasara na ụmụ ọrangụtanụ nọ n'ime Bọnioo.
English: These relationships help in planning, design, and operations of roadway facilities.
Igbo: Mmetụta ndị a na-enyere aka n’ime atụmatụ, ncheremee, na arụmọrụ nke akụrụngwa okporo ụzọ ụgbọ ígwè.
English: It has brought us the train, the car, and many other transportation devices.
Igbo: O wetegoro anyị ụgbọoloko, ụgbọala na ọtụtụ akụrụngwa njem dị iche iche.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone.
Igbo:'}]
label: Ndị uwe ojii Madhya Pradesh weghachitela nkùnụkwụ na ekwentị kengagharị ndị e zuru n'ohi.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: This gives them a wider range of small places to hide from predators.
Igbo: Nke a na-eme ka ha nwee ọtụtụ ebe izonarị ndị na-eri ha.
English: Although Winfrey was tearful in her farewell, she made it clear to her fans she will be back.
Igbo: N'agbanyeghi na Winfrey bu anya mmiri n'okwu ije ọma ya, o mere ka ndị ihe ya na-amasị mata nke ọma na ọ ga-alọghachi.
English: Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets.
Igbo: A sị na ozuzu ohi gara n'ihu ogologo abalị niile, n'ihi na ndị ọrụ mmanye iwu anọghị n'okporo ama Bishkek.
English: European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.
Igbo: Ike onwunwe ndị Yurop ọchịchị ala ọzọ bidoro n’ime narị afọ nke iri na ise, dị ka one ngagharị one Pọtugalụ Vasco da Gama chọtara Ụzọ Kepụ site na Yurop ruo Indịa.
English: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence.
Igbo: Aha niile, tinyere okwu Sie maka gị, na-ebidokarị n’iji mkpụrụ edemede ukwu, ọbụnadị n’etiti ahịrịokwu.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, "We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop".
Igbo:'}]
label: Onye na-esote Onye Isi Ndị Uweojii bụ D K Arya kwuru sị, "Anyị anwụchiela mmadụ ise ndị dinara n'ike nwanyị Swiss ahụ ma napụtakwa ekwentị na nkùnụkwụ ya".

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda.
Igbo: Goma bụ obodo nleta nke Democratic Replublic nke Kongo n'ime akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ kachasị anya na nso Rwanda.
English: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions.
Igbo: NextGen bụ otu sistemụ FAA na-asị ga-enye ụgbọ elu òhèerè ife site n’ụzọ kara pee mpe ma chekwa ọtụtụ nde galọnụ nke mmanụ kwa afọ na mkpọfụ anwụrụ.
English: Reindeer husbandry is an important livelihood among the Sámi and the culture surrounding the trade is important also for many with other professions.
Igbo: Ọzụzụ Reindeer dị mkpa nke ukwuu ọkachasị n’ime ihe banyere ndụ na omenaala ndị Sámi nakwa ahịa gbara ya okirikiri dịkwa mkpa maka ọtụtụ akaọrụ ndị ọzọ.
English: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008.
Igbo: N'ime mmadụ otu puku na iri anọ tụrụ ụtụ tupu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị gọọmenti etiti nke afọ 2010, ndị megidere mba Ọstrelia ịbụ obodo kwuuru onwe ya ji pasentị asatọ rịa elu kemgbe afọ 2008.
English: It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states.
Igbo: O nweghi ikike imechi iwu ụtụisi na tarifu n'etiti steeti na steeti.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar.
Igbo:"}]
label: Ndị eboro ebubo bụ Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar na Vishnu Kanjar.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Argentina is well known for having one of the best polo teams and players in the world.
Igbo: Amaara mba Ajentịna dịka obodo nwere ndị egwuregwu na otu egwuregwu polo kachasị mma n'ụwa dum.
English: This is matched by Norway, Sweden and New Zealand, but otherwise quite unique (e.g. in the Netherlands the figure is one to forty).
Igbo: Norway, Sweden na New Zealand emegokwa ya, mana ewezụga ha, ihe a bụ ihe mmeta pụrụ iche (dịka ọmụmaatụ na Netherlands fịgọ a bụ otu nye iri anọ).
English: These couples may choose to make an adoption plan for their baby.
Igbo: Di na nwunye ndị a nwere ike ịhọrọ ime atụmatụ mkpọta nwa maka nwa ha.
English: This gives them a wider range of small places to hide from predators.
Igbo: Nke a na-eme ka ha nwee ọtụtụ ebe izonarị ndị na-eri ha.
English: France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy.
Igbo: Frans bụ mba nke asaa n'ọgbakọ Iroopu ịta ahụhụ n'ihi ọrịa a; osotere Ọstrịa, Jemani, Slovenia, Bọlgeria, Gris na Itali.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Many of the traditions surrounding the holiday have been adopted also by non-believers in Christian countries and non-Christians around the world.
Igbo: Ndi na-ekweghi na Chukwu na mba ndi otu Kristi gasi ma ndi n’abughi ndi otu Kristi n’uwa niile anabatago otutu odinala enwere maka oge ezumike.
English: Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called "non-serious."
Igbo: N'izuka gara aga, METI mara okwa sị na Apple gwara ya gbasara oke ekpomoku iri atọ na anọ merenụ, nke ụlọ ọrụ kpọrọ "ihe na-abụghị ihe."
English: Before an organization can be innovative, leadership must create a culture of innovation as well as shared knowledge and organizational learning.
Igbo: Tupu ulo-oru obula enwee ike idi n’eweputa uche-ohuru, nduzi aghaghi ikepuya omenala uche-ohuu dika kwa nkerita nghota na imu ihe nke ulo-oru.
English: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.
Igbo: O kwughi oke a ga-akwụ, kama ọ sị na a ga-ele anya na nrụpụta akụ na ụba China wee kwụọ ụgwọ.
English: Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively.
Igbo: Onye na-ekwubu okwu n'ụlọ omeiwu bụ Newt Gingrich, onye isi obodo Tekzas bụ Rik Perị, na onye otu nzukọ omeiwu Mishel Bakmann mechara gba ndị anọ, ise na isii, n'usoro.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt.
Igbo:'}]
label: Obu eziokwu na mmadu ato no nime ulo ahu mgbe ugbo-ala ahu kuru ya, onweghi onye nime ha meruru ahu.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: The bridge is scheduled to be fully operational in September 2017, when the Brazilian customs checkpoints are expected to be finished.
Igbo: E hiwere na akwa ahụ ga-ebido rụwa ọrụ n'uju na Septemba 2017, mgbe a na-ele anya ịrụcha ebe nnyocha nke ụlọọrụ na-ahụ maka ọpụpụ na mbata nke ndị Brazili.
English: Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race.
Igbo: Nke mbụ ya bụ Slalom ahụ, ebe o ritara otu Agbachaghị n'ọsọ mbụ ya. Mmadụ 36 n'ime 116 sọrọ mpi ahụ nwetara otu ihe ahụ n'ọsọ ahụ.
English: Its long jaws were studded with more than 70 razor-sharp teeth, along with an extra set in the roof of its mouth, meaning that there was no escape for anything that crossed its path.
Igbo: Agba ogologo ya bụ nke emejupụtara n'iji ihe karịrị eze dị aguba-nkọ iri asaa, yana òtú òtù mmezi n'elu ọnụ ya, nke pụtara na ọ nweghị ụzọ mgbapụ maka ihe ọ bụla gafere n'ụzọ ya.
English: All of the cave entrances, which were named "The Seven Sisters", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter.
Igbo: Ụzọ niile dị n'ọgba ahụ a kpọrọ “Ụmụnne nwanyị asaa” dị ihe dịka opekatampe 100 mita ruo mita 250 (fiiti 328 ruo 820) na dayamita.
English: The harbor was the site of an infamous naval standoff in 1889 when seven ships from Germany, the US, and Britain refused to leave the harbor.
Igbo: Ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ bụ ebe nguzosike nke ndị agha mmiri wuru ewu na 1889 mgbe nnukwu ụgbọ mmiri asaa si Jamani, US, na Briten jụrụ ịhapụ ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Research has found that females are two times more likely to have MS then males.
Igbo: Nnyocha achọpụtala na ụmụ nwanyị bụ ihe yikarịrị ugboro abụọ inwe MS karịa ụmụ nwoke.
English: Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.
Igbo: Ọzọ, ụfọdụ sadụl, ọkachasị sadụl Bekee, nwere ebe nchekwa na-ekwe ka akpụkpọ anụ si na sadụl dapụ ma onye na-anya anya sere ya laa azụ mgbe ọ na-ada.
English: Boating is a national pastime in Finland, with a boat to every seven or eight people.
Igbo: Akwọm ụgbọmmiri bụ ihe mmemme nchereoge na mba Finlandị, nke bụ otu ụgbọmmiri ibu mmadụ asaa maọbụ asatọ.
English: The fission bomb works on the principle that it takes energy to put together a nucleus with many protons and neutrons.
Igbo: Bọmbụ fishọn ahụ na-arụ ọrụ n’iwu na ọ na ewere ike ijikọta otu nuclus ya na ọtụtụ protọnụ na nutrọnụ.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: It has brought us the train, the car, and many other transportation devices.
Igbo: O wetegoro anyị ụgbọoloko, ụgbọala na ọtụtụ akụrụngwa njem dị iche iche.

Igbo: Ndịòtù nke otu okpuru omenala na-akpọtụrụkarị ịdị n'òtù ha site n'otu ojiji akanka pụrụ iche ma dịmara, nke gụnyere ụmụ ejiji, omume, na asụsụ ịgba izu.
English: At one point a member of the mob waved the head of a royal guard killed at Versailles in front of the terrified Queen.
Igbo: N'otu mgbe otu n'ime ndị igwe mmadụ fegharịrị isi onye nche eze egburu na Versailles n'ihu eze nwanyi ụjọ ji.
English: The two towers rise to a height of 83 meters, it's 378 meters long and it has two lanes of 3.50 m wide.
Igbo: Towa abuo ahu rigoro 83 meters, ogologo o bu 378 meters n’ogologo ma o nwekwara obodobo uzo abuo di 3.50m.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains.
Igbo: Obodo ochie nke Smyrna na mbụ, ọ bụzi ugbu a otu ebe na-ewi ewi, mepere emepe, na azụmaahịa dịnọrụ, e wubere gburugburu otu nnukwu ọnụ mmiri ma ụmụ ugwu gbaakwa ya gburugburu.
English: This behavior oftentimes results in rifts between the leaders and the rest of the team.
Igbo: Omume a ọtụtụ mgbe na adapụta n'esemokwu n'etiti ndị isi na ndị òtù ndị ọzọ fọdụrụnụ.
English: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.
Igbo: Mgbe ọbụla ụmụ obere ihe dị ndụ (obere ọnụ ọgụgụ yiri onwe ha) si na ndị otu ha pụọ (dịka ha gafee ugwu, osimiri, maọbụ gaa n'agwaetiti ọzọ ebe ọ ga-ara ahụ isi laghachi) ha ga-achọta onwe ha na gburugburu di iche ọtụtụ mgbe.
English: If visiting a formally arranged garden, collecting "specimens" is also going to get you ejected, without discussion.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ị na-eleta otu ubi ahazigoro etu o kwesịrị, ị na-ewere "ụmụ ihe nlere" ga-eme ka a chụpụ gị, na-emeghị mkparịta ụka.
English: 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch.
Igbo: 34 nime-otu-nari-nile bu ndi tinyere aka na ntuli aka ahu n’enwe otu uche ahu, n’acho ka Eze-nwanyi Elizabeth II buru onye eze nke ikpeazu nke Australia.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life.
Igbo:'}]
label: Ụmụ Kọmetị nwere ike ịbụ isi mmalite nnefe mmiri nye ụwa ya na ihe dị ndụ nwere ike ịmepụta ụmụ protiin ma kwado ndụ.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ị kwụrụ ụgwọ maka ụgbọelu gị na ebe obibi gị maka 2020 tupu ekwuputa myigharịrị oge, i nwere ike inwe ọnọdụ tara akpụ.
English: This provides us with a lot of information and material to build simulation models which help us to understand processes in our mind.
Igbo: Nke a na-akuziri anyị ọtụtụ ihe ma na-enye anyị ihe anyị ji arụ oyiri ya nke na-enyere anyị aka ịghọta usoro n'uche anyị.
English: Everyone can achieve enlightenment. The only thing standing in the way of this goal is our own tension and negativity.
Igbo: Mmadụ nile nwere ike ịma ihe. Sọ ohe nọchiri ụzọ bụ ekweghị ekwe nke anyi na ụjọ.
English: These couples may choose to make an adoption plan for their baby.
Igbo: Di na nwunye ndị a nwere ike ịhọrọ ime atụmatụ mkpọta nwa maka nwa ha.
English: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.
Igbo: Ụdị ụmụaka a ka a na akpọ ndị azụghị azụ. Ọtụtụ ụmụaka an na azụghị azụ abụrụla ndị ndị mmadụ jituru ejitu (ọ na abụkarị ndị mụrụ ha); oge ụfọdụ ngharịpụ ụmụaka bụ maka ọjụjụ ntụpọ dị na ahụ nwatakịrị ahụ a na ahụ anya maọbụ ntụpọ dị n' akọ n'uche ya.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.
Igbo:'}]
label: Ndị ọka mmụta sayensị nwere olileanya ịghọta ka uwa dị iche iche sị kpụọ, ọkachasị otu ụwa anyị siri kpụọ, kemgbe okwute igwe na ụwa anyị sukọkọ isi n'ote aka.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Another difference was that while the poor people and the woman ate their food while sitting in chairs, the rich men liked to have banquets together where they would lounge on their sides while they ate their meals.
Igbo: Ihe ọzọ dị iche bụ na ebe ndị ogbenye na nwanyị ahụ riri nri ha ka ha nọ ọdụ n'oche, ndị ọgaranya na-enwe mmasị inwe mmemme oriri ebe ha ga-eri nke ha n'ezumike.
English: Ancient cultures and tribes began to keep them for easy access to milk, hair, meat, and skins.
Igbo: Omenala ndị mgbe ochie na agbụrụ bidoro iji dobe ha maka inweta ohere dị mfe na mmiri ara, ntutu isi, anụ, na anụahụ gasị.
English: Severe weather can occur anywhere in the world, and there are different types of it, which can depend on geography, topography, and atmospheric conditions.
Igbo: Ihu igwe dị oke njọ nwere ike ime n'ebe ọbụla n'ụwa, ma o nwere ụdị dị iche iche, nke nwere ike idabere na ọdịdịala, ọdịdịebe na ọnọdụ keikuku.
English: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria.
Igbo: Pastrị ndị Jamini dị nnọọ mma; na Bavaria, ọ na-enwe ọtụtụ ihe ma dịkwa iche iche ka nke ndị Ọstrịa, agbata obi ha n'akụkụ ndịda.
English: In developed countries you seldom hear similar levels of complaints about water quality or bridges falling down.
Igbo: N'ime ụmụ mba mepere emepe ọ ga-ara ahụ tupu ị nụ larịị mkpesa ndị yirinụ gbasara ogo mmiri ma ọ bụ ụmụ akwa mmiri na-ada n'ala.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Cuomo, 53, began his governorship earlier this year and signed a bill last month legalizing same-sex marriage.
Igbo:"}]
label: Kuomo, onye dị afọ iri ise na atọ, bidoro ọchịchị gọọmenti steeti na mbido afọ a ma binye aka n'ọnwa gara aga n'iwu kwadoro mmekọahụ nwoke na nwoke maọbụ nwanyị na nwanyị.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Large areas further north are quite sparsely populated and some is nearly uninhabited wilderness.
Igbo: Ebe ndị buru ibu na ngapụga ugwu bụ ọzara nke obere ndị mmadụ bi ma ụfọdụ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ebe ndị mmadụ ebighị.
English: However, people who know a little Spanish may hastily conclude that Portuguese is close enough that it need not be studied separately.
Igbo: Agbanyeghi, ndị mara asụsụ Spenụ obere nwere ike ikpebi ọsịịsọ na ya na asụsụ Pọtugiizi yrir nke ọma na o kwesịghị ka a mụọ ya n’iche.
English: This new environment has different resources and different competitors, so the new population will need different features or adaptations to be a strong competitor than what they had needed before.
Igbo: Gburugburu ọhụrụ a nwere akụrụngwa dị iche ma ndị ịsọmpi dị iche, n'ihi nke a ọnụọgụgụ ọhụrụ ahụ kwesịrị inwe akụrụngwa dị iche maọbụ ihe mmegharị ọzọ ga eme ya ka ọbụrụ onye ịsọmpi dị ike karịa ka ọdịbu.
English: Its all-pervading power affected everyone from king to commoner.
Igbo: Ike ya juputara ebe niile metụtara onye ọbụla site n'eze ruo na mmadụ nkịtị.
English: Popular sports include football, basketball, volleyball, water-polo, fencing, rugby, cycling, ice hockey, roller hockey and F1 motor racing.
Igbo: Egwuregwu ndị a ma ama gụnyere futbọl, basketbọl, volleybọl, polo-mmiri, fencing, rugby, ịgba ịnyịnya, hockey ice, hockey roller na ịgba ọsọ ụgbọ ala F1.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: He referred to the rumors as "political chatter and silliness".
Igbo:'}]
label: Ọ kpọrọ asịrị ndị ahụ "mkparịta ụka ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na nzuzu".

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.
Igbo: Ọzọ, ụfọdụ sadụl, ọkachasị sadụl Bekee, nwere ebe nchekwa na-ekwe ka akpụkpọ anụ si na sadụl dapụ ma onye na-anya anya sere ya laa azụ mgbe ọ na-ada.
English: This new environment has different resources and different competitors, so the new population will need different features or adaptations to be a strong competitor than what they had needed before.
Igbo: Gburugburu ọhụrụ a nwere akụrụngwa dị iche ma ndị ịsọmpi dị iche, n'ihi nke a ọnụọgụgụ ọhụrụ ahụ kwesịrị inwe akụrụngwa dị iche maọbụ ihe mmegharị ọzọ ga eme ya ka ọbụrụ onye ịsọmpi dị ike karịa ka ọdịbu.
English: To better represent traffic flow, relationships have been established between the three main characteristics: (1) flow, (2) density, and (3) velocity.
Igbo: Iji ka mma na-anọchi anya ije nke okporo ụzọ, E mebewo mmekọrịta n'etiti isi njirimara atọ ahụ: (1) eruba, (2) njupụta, na (3) ike ọsọ.
English: Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary.
Igbo: N'ọsọ ya nke ọzọ, Giant Slalom, ọ gbachara dị ka onye nke iri n'otu ụmụ nwanyị nọ ọdụ ebe oge ọsọ ya niile bụ nkeji 4: 41.30, nke ji nkeji 2: 11.60 nọrọ n'azụ onye nke mbụ Claudia Loesch onye Austria ma jiri nkeji 1: 09.02 nọrọ n'azụ Gyöngyi Dani onye Hungary gbara onye nke itoolu.
English: The satellite in space gets the call and then reflects it back down, almost instantly.
Igbo: Satilaịti nọ n'ikuku na enweta oku ma zighachi ya n'ala na ntabi anya.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: He is speculated to make a run for president in 2016.
Igbo:"}]
label: A na-aka na ọ ga-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala n'afọ 2016.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.
Igbo: O kwughi oke a ga-akwụ, kama ọ sị na a ga-ele anya na nrụpụta akụ na ụba China wee kwụọ ụgwọ.
English: In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio.
Igbo: N’oge mbu ya, ihe ngosi a ka egosiputara n’igwe saịtị intaneti na-agba ọsọ nke TogiNet Radio, ebe a lekwasịrị anya na redio na-ekwu okwu.
English: The crust is about 70 km thick on the near side and 100 km thick on the far side.
Igbo: Crọstụ ahụ dị ihe dị ka km70 n'ịgba agba n'akụkụ ya dị nso na km100 n'ịgba ịgba n'akụkụ ya tere anya.
English: However, due to the slow communication channels, styles in the west could lag behind by 25 to 30 year.
Igbo: Mana, n'ihi ụkpụrụ mkparịta ụka na adịghị ọsịsọ, usoro dị na ọdịda anyanwụ nwere ike inọzụga azụ n'oteaka afọ iri abụọ na ise ruo iri atọ.
English: Many common formats (APS family of formats, for example) are equal to or closely approximate this aspect ratio.
Igbo: Ọtụtụ usoro nkịtị (dịka usoro APS si n'otu ezinaụlọ) ga-abụ otu ihe maọbụ ruo ihe dịka nkepụta nkewa a.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions.
Igbo:"}]
label: NextGen bụ otu sistemụ FAA na-asị ga-enye ụgbọ elu òhèerè ife site n’ụzọ kara pee mpe ma chekwa ọtụtụ nde galọnụ nke mmanụ kwa afọ na mkpọfụ anwụrụ.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.
Igbo: Ọ bụ eziokwu na otu ọgwụ mgbochi aka na-ele anya egosila na o nwere ike ịbelata oke ndị mmadụ ji anwụ n'ihi ọrịa Ebola, mana ruo ugbu a, enwebeghi ọgwụ ọbụla gosiri hooha na o nwere ike ịgwọ onye bu ọrịa a.
English: The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas.
Igbo: Sundabans kpuchiri ohere km² 3850, nke mmiri maọbụ ala apịtị kpuchiri otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ ya.
English: They did two experiments marking either the DNA in the phage with a radioactive phosphorus or the protein of the phage with radioactive sulfur.
Igbo: Ha mere nnwale abụọ ebe ha ji rediyoaktiv fosforọs kaa akara na DNA nọ na fej maọbụ jiri rediyoaktiv sọlfọ kaa akara na protin nọ na fej.
English: Research in AI involves making machines to automate tasks that require intelligent behavior.
Igbo: Nchọpụta na ngalaba AI gụnyere ịmepụta igwe ndị ga na-arụ ụmụ ọrụ ndị na-achọ amamihe nwere usoro.
English: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.
Igbo: Òtù Mmụta Irak ahụ gosipụtara nchọpụta ya na 12.00 GMT taa.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.
Igbo:"}]
label: O ji teknụzụ satilaịti dị iche na teknụzụ rada nọ n'ala were enyere ndị na-ejikwa nfegharị ụgbọelu aka ịma ebe ụgbọelu nọ kpọmkwem ma nyekwa ndị ọkwọ ụgbọelu ozi ziri ezi.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked.
Igbo: Ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi ndị Chaịna n’oge mbụ kọrọ maka ụgbọ elu a chọrọ izuru.
English: Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece.
Igbo: A chọtala sistemu nsi fọdụrụnụ n’ụlọ Minoan ndị dị n’obodo Crete na Santorini na Greece
English: This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats.
Igbo: Sedimenti a dị mkpa maka ịmepụta ụmụ mgbochi ejiri aja mee ma akụkụ osimiri, nke jere ozi dị ka ebe obibi anụ ọhịa.
English: A full 20 percent of the water that pours out of the planet's rivers into the oceans comes from the Amazon.
Igbo: Pasentị mmmiri 20 zuru oke nke na-awụpụta site na osimiri ụwa ga na-abanye n'ime oke osimiri ga si n'Amazọn abịa.
English: All these things and more highlight Ontario as what is considered quintessentially Canadian by outsiders.
Igbo: Ihe ndị a niile na ọzọ na-egosipụta Ọntario dị ka ihe echere na ọ bụ site n'ogo kachasị zuo oke Ndị Kanada site n'aka ndị ọbịa.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: No extra transport is being put on and overground trains will not stop at Wembley, and car parking and park-and-ride facilities are unavailable at the ground.
Igbo:"}]
label: Anaghị etinyekwasị ihe njem, ma ụgbọoloko elu ala agaghị akwụsị na Wembli, ma ndowe ụgbọala makwa akụrụngwa dowe ma gbakwaa adịghị ebe ahụ.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: You can also have alloys that include small amounts of non-metallic elements like carbon.
Igbo: I nwekwara ike nwee allọyi nke gụnyere nwa-obere njieme gasị nke enweghị metalik dịka cabọn.
English: Workplace harmony is crucial, emphasizing group effort rather than praising individual accomplishments.
Igbo: Nkwekorita nke ebe oru di nkpa, na-ekwusi ike na mbọ otu karịa ito ụmụ mmezu nke otu onye.
English: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination.
Igbo: Itinye akwụkwọ n’ọdịnihu na-enye onye njem ahụ obi udo na ha nwere ebe ha ga-arahụ ụra ozugbo ha rutere ebe ha na-aga.

Igbo: E jirila ụmụ ogologo ụlọ elu na-achọ igwe Họng Kọng mma maa atụ na ha yiri eserese baa chat, nke mmiri Viktoria Habọ mere ka ọ pụta ihe.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.
Igbo: Ndị isi obodo na-adọ ndị bi n'obodo gburugburu igwe ọrụ ahụ aka na ntị ka ha nọrọ n'ime ụlọ, gbanyụọ ntụ oyi ma ghara iṅu mmiri na-agba n'ụlọ.
English: Foster care is supposed to provide all the necessities that were lacking in the home they were previously taken from.
Igbo: Ulo nlekọta anya ndi akpotara-akpota kwesiri inyecha ihe nile di mkpa nke na adighi n’ulo ochie esi na kpota ha.

Igbo: Onu ogugu ndi mmadu obodo Vatican di nari 800. O bu obodo kacha nta n’uwa n’uwa n’uwa na obodo n’ogbe ndi kacha pere mpe.
English: The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred.
