messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.
Igbo: Gburugburu Medina ochie ahụ ọ dị mfe ịchọta ebe ndị na-ere ụmụ ngwaahịa ọdịnala Ndị Moroko, dị ka ụmụ tagịnị, ite akpụrụ akpụ, ngwaahịa ejiri akpụkpọ anụ mee, huuka, na giigawụ nke ụdịdị dị iche iche zuru ezu, mana ha nille bụ maka ndị nleta.
English: Its long jaws were studded with more than 70 razor-sharp teeth, along with an extra set in the roof of its mouth, meaning that there was no escape for anything that crossed its path.
Igbo: Agba ogologo ya bụ nke emejupụtara n'iji ihe karịrị eze dị aguba-nkọ iri asaa, yana òtú òtù mmezi n'elu ọnụ ya, nke pụtara na ọ nweghị ụzọ mgbapụ maka ihe ọ bụla gafere n'ụzọ ya.
English: You can also have alloys that include small amounts of non-metallic elements like carbon.
Igbo: I nwekwara ike nwee allọyi nke gụnyere nwa-obere njieme gasị nke enweghị metalik dịka cabọn.
English: Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.
Igbo: Ndị uwe ojii kwuru na ahụ ahụ dị ka ọ nọọla ebe ahụ ruo ihe dị ka otu ụbọchị.
English: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

English: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training.

Igbo:"}]
label: Mgbe ọbụla ụmụ obere ihe dị ndụ (obere ọnụ ọgụgụ yiri onwe ha) si na ndị otu ha pụọ (dịka ha gafee ugwu, osimiri, maọbụ gaa n'agwaetiti ọzọ ebe ọ ga-ara ahụ isi laghachi) ha ga-achọta onwe ha na gburugburu di iche ọtụtụ mgbe.

English: For instance, they didn't have corn, nor tomatoes, nor potatoes, nor cocoa, and no ancient Roman ever tasted a turkey.

English: Plants make their food from the sun by photosynthesis. They also provide shade.

Igbo: Ndagwurugwuru Cochamó - ebe arimelu nwere ogo kachasị elu nke Chile, a mara dị ka Yosemite nke Ndịda Amerịka, ya na ụdị dị iche iche nke ụmụ nnukwu ahụaja kọnkịrị na nnukwu nkume.
English: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.
Igbo: Dr. Toni Moll chọpụtara nje Tubakụlọsis (XDR-TB) nke na-emegide ọgwụ na ngalaba Sawụt Afrịka nke KwaZulu-Natal.
English: The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October.
Igbo: Ntinye ọrụ ahụ bụ azịza Martelly maka ngagharị iwe nke mgbochi ọchịchị zuru ebe niile nke bidoro na Ọktoba.
English: The terrified King Louis XVI, Queen Marie Antoinette their two young children (11 year old Marie Therese and four year old Louis-Charles) and the King's sister, Madam Elizabeth, on the 6th October 1789 were forced back to Paris from Versailles by a mob of market women.
Igbo: N'Oktoba 6, 1789, ụmụ nwanyị ahịa iwe ji yiri Eze Luwi XVI oke egwu mgbe ha si na Versailles dọrọ ya, nwunye ya Marịa Antwanet, obere ụmụ ha abụọ (Marịa Teriza dị afọ 11 na Luwi-Chals dị afọ anọ), na nwanne nwanyị Eze, Madam Elizabet, dọghachi ha na Parii.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words "Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down.
Igbo:'}]
label: Ka-edere na azu nkwuputa nke nnoro-onwe bu okwua “Nkwuputa nke Nnoro-onwe Nke bu ezie ubochi abali 4 juli 1776” .Ederede ahu putara na ala-ala akwukwo ahu, kpodo isi na-ala.

messages:

English: Internal poisoning may not be immediately apparent. Symptoms, such as vomiting are sufficiently general that an immediate diagnosis cannot be made.

English: There are no particular "rainy" and "dry" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken.

English: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

Igbo: Nke mbụ ya bụ Slalom ahụ, ebe o ritara otu Agbachaghị n'ọsọ mbụ ya. Mmadụ 36 n'ime 116 sọrọ mpi ahụ nwetara otu ihe ahụ n'ọsọ ahụ.

English: Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving.
Igbo: Singapore bu kwanu ebe di mma ino makwa igaghari ma inwere ike igote ihe o bula i choro ma irute.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:

English: We call this process speciation, which just means the formation of new species. Speciation is an unavoidable consequence and a very important part of evolution.

Igbo: Ha niile fọrọ obere ka ha bụrụchaa akụkụ mmiri aja aja ya na igwu mmiri echedoro echedo, ma ọtụtụ n'ime ha nwere ndo enyere site n'aka ụmụ osisi pohutukawa.
English: The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna.
Igbo: Okwu bụ safari n’ojiji ama ama pụtara ime njem n’ofe ala ileleanụ ọhịa Afrịka dị ịtụnanya, tụnadị na savanna.

English: In the manner that Paris is known as the fashion capital of the contemporary world, Constantinople was regarded as the fashion capital of feudal Europe.

label: N'otu aka a maara Paris ka isi ejiji ịchọ mma n'ụwa nke oge a, e weere Kọnstantinopul dịka isi ejiji ịchọ mma na mba Yuropu n'oge agha.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Blogs can also help improve student writing. While students often begin their blog experience with sloppy grammar and spelling, the presence of an audience generally changes that.

English: Usually you always here the sound of tourists and vendors. The story of the sound and light is just like a story book.

English: Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee.

English: Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium.
Igbo: Ya na naanị medaal iri na asatọ dị kwa otu ụbọchị, ọtụtụ mba adala imepụta ikpo okwu medaal ahụ.
English: Moreover, failure to do so has serious consequences: growth depression, malnutrition, and ultimately death.
Igbo: Ọzọ dịka ibe ya, ị jụ ime ihe a nwere nnukwu ntaramahụhụ: nnukwu ndamụmbà, ọtịtaahụ, nakwa ọnwụ n'ikpeazụ.
English: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.
Igbo: Duval, bụ onye lụgoro nwanyị ma mụta ụmụ abụọ bụgoro okenye, a hapụghịrị Mila onyere akọọrọ akụkọ nnukwu ihe nlere anya.
English: Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race.
Igbo: Nke mbụ ya bụ Slalom ahụ, ebe o ritara otu Agbachaghị n'ọsọ mbụ ya. Mmadụ 36 n'ime 116 sọrọ mpi ahụ nwetara otu ihe ahụ n'ọsọ ahụ.
English: Ancient cultures and tribes began to keep them for easy access to milk, hair, meat, and skins.
Igbo: Omenala ndị mgbe ochie na agbụrụ bidoro iji dobe ha maka inweta ohere dị mfe na mmiri ara, ntutu isi, anụ, na anụahụ gasị.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: For example, “learning” and “socialization” are suggested as important motivations for Internet use (James et al., 1995).
Igbo:"}]
label: Maka ọmụmaatụ, “mmụta” na “mkpakọrịta” bụ ndị atụnyere dịka mkpalite dị mkpa maka ojiji Ịntanetị (James na ndị ọzọ., 1995).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: This was more like the four states of matter (in the same order): solid, liquid, gas, and plasma, though he also theorised that they change into new substances to form what we see.
Igbo: Nke a dị kara yiri ọnọdụ anọ nke mata (n’usoro ahụ kwa): nsiriike, mmiri mmiri, ikuku, na plasma, agbanyeghị na o nyere tiori na ha na-agbanwe ghụọ umi ọhụrụ iji mepụta ihe anyị na-ahụ anya.
English: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted.
Igbo: Mgbe aruchara akwa-mmiri ahu na afo 1963, ewee kwusi udu idemiri ahu nke na agbasa unyi na ahu mmiri ahu nile.
English: There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike.
Igbo: A ka nwere ọtụtụ ndị dị ndụ taa lanarịrị oge ha nọrọ ebe a, na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ ndị nwere ndị ha hụrụ n'anya ndị e gburu ma ọ bụ jiri ọrụ gbuo ha ebe ahụ, ma Ndị Juu ma ndị ọzọ na-abụghị Ndị Juu.
English: People would bring sacrifices to the gods and the priests would try to attend to the needs of the gods through ceremonies and festivals.
Igbo: Ebe ndị mmadụ wetaara chi ndị ahụ aja, ndị nchụ aja ahụ maka ihe ha bụ chi na-achọ, site n'emume na mmemme di iche iche.
English: A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience.
Igbo: Otu ihe ọmụmụ ga-akọwa nke ọma ihe niile a kọwara ebe a tinyekwa ahụmihe bara uru.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: “Personal involvement” and “continuing relationships” were also identified as new motivation aspects by Eighmey and McCord (1998) when they investigated audience reactions to websites.
Igbo:"}]
label: Eighmey na McCord(1998) chọpụtara na “nsonye” na “mmekọrịta ga-adịgịde” sokwa na ihe mkpali ọhụrụ mgbe ha nyochara mmeghachi omume ndị na-abịa n'ọtụtụ webụsaịtị.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option.
Igbo: N'ebe ndị zopuru ezopu, n'enweghị netwọk ekwentị, ikekwe ekwentị satịlaịt ga-abụ naanị nzọpụta i nwere.
English: Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.
Igbo: Enwere orịa a ka na-enyo enyo ka ọ bụ H5N1na mba Kroeshia na Denmak.
English: Had the Allies failed, Germany probably would have been able to conquer Britain as it had the rest of Europe.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ndị mba bụbu ndị mmekọrịta dara, Jamanị nwere ike eleghi anya merie Briten dị ka o mere Yurop ndị ọzọ fọdụrụ.
English: Virtually all computers in use today are based on the manipulation of information which is coded in the form of binary numbers.
Igbo: Ihe dịka igwe kọmputa niile e ji arụ ọrụ taa bụ ihe sitere na mkpụrụokwu ndị a gwakọrọ agwakọ nke e tinyere dịka mkpụrụọnụọgụ.
English: It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.
Igbo: Ọ na-ara ezigbote ahụ ịgbanwe ego Falklands ma e si n'agwaetiti a pụọ, ya mere gbanwee ego gi tupu i si na ya pụọ.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The use of video recording has led to important discoveries in the interpretation of micro-expressions, facial movements which last a few milliseconds.
Igbo:"}]
label: Ojiji nke ndekọ vidio edugawo na ụmụ nchọpụta dị mkpa n’ime nkọwa nke nzipụta-n’ihu-kentakịrị, mmegharị ihu nke na-anọru milisekọnd ole na ole.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called "The Giant Province of the Indies", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups.
Igbo: N'ime narị afọ nke iri na isii Paragwei, a kpọbụrụ "Nnukwu Ngalaba Ọchịchị nke Ndị Indii", bụ nke a mụrụ n'ihi mbịakwute nke ndị mmeri Ndị Spen ya na ụmụ òtù nwaafọ amaala.
English: Another difference was that while the poor people and the woman ate their food while sitting in chairs, the rich men liked to have banquets together where they would lounge on their sides while they ate their meals.
Igbo: Ihe ọzọ dị iche bụ na ebe ndị ogbenye na nwanyị ahụ riri nri ha ka ha nọ ọdụ n'oche, ndị ọgaranya na-enwe mmasị inwe mmemme oriri ebe ha ga-eri nke ha n'ezumike.
English: The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte.
Igbo: Ndị Arabụ wetekwara okpukpere Alakụba n'ala ndị ahụ, ma a nabatara ya nke ukwuu na mba Komoros na Mayọtụ.
English: In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver.
Igbo: N'afọ 1956 Słania gara Swiden, ebe afọ atọ gasịrị o bidoro ịrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ nzipu ozi nke Swiden ma bụrụkwa onye isi mbinye.
English: As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance.
Igbo: Dị ka ụmụ bọọsụ njikọ-mpaghara na-ejukarị eju, ọ bụ ezi ndụmọdụ ịzụta otu tiketi ụbọchị ole na ole n'ọdịnihu.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: In particular, it is claimed that one can detect whether a person is lying by interpreting micro-expressions correctly.
Igbo:'}]
label: Akachasị ekwu na mmadụ nwere ike ịma mmgbe mmadụ na atụ asi ma ọbụrụ na onwere ike ịkọwapụta obere mmegharị ahụ dị iche iche ọfụma.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna.
Igbo: Ndị mgba ibe ha mere ihe ndị gosiri nkwanye ugwu nye Luna.
English: This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
Igbo: Nke a ga-ekwe ka ndị na-egwu egwuregwu jikwaa ihe omume na njegharị n'egwuregwu vidiyo site na imegharị ngwa ọrụ ahụ n'ikuku.
English: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start.
Igbo: Giancarlo Fisichella ejikwalighi ụgbọ ala ya wee si n'ọsọ ahụ pụọ n'isi mmalite ya.
English: The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect.
Igbo: Agbanyeghị, mpaghara Schengen na-arụ ọrụ dịka mba a na-akwanyere ugwu.
English: Everyone can achieve enlightenment. The only thing standing in the way of this goal is our own tension and negativity.
Igbo: Mmadụ nile nwere ike ịma ihe. Sọ ohe nọchiri ụzọ bụ ekweghị ekwe nke anyi na ụjọ.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Oliver Sacks, in his paper The President's Speech, indicated how people who are unable to understand speech because of brain damage are nevertheless able to assess sincerity accurately.
Igbo:"}]
label: Oliver Saks, n'akwụkwọ ya Okwu Onyeisi Obodo, gosiri ka ndị enweghị ike ịghọta ọnụ okwu n'ihi isi mmebi nwere ike ikwu mgbe mmadụ na-ekwu eziokwu.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid.
Igbo: Ndị nnyocha ahụ chọpụtara na ọ kpụrụ okwute mgbe e tinyere melamin na siyanurik asid n'ime amịrị buusu.
English: With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations.
Igbo: N’iji Yoga Kundalini ike Kundalini (ike mmepe anya) bụ nke etetara site n’ụmụ postchọ yoga, mgbatị ahụ iku ume, ukwe ntụgharị uche na ihe ngosi.
English: To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite.
Igbo: Ịhụta Họng Kọng n'ụzọ kachasị mma, pụọ n'agwaetiti gawa na Kowloon, mpaghara akụkụ mmiri, nke chere gị ihu.
English: Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).
Igbo: Guzosie ike n'ịsị ụmụ nwoke mba, ma atụla egwu ịkwechiri (na-agbanyeghi ọdịnala ọbụla nke ọ bụ, o kwesighi ekwesi!).
English: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.
Igbo: Mkpebi teknụụzụ bụ usoro gazuru nchịkọta nchepụta gasị etinyere n’uju, site na technụụzụ-kwàa maọbụ nye iwu siri ike nke bụ na njedebe nke onye ga-esite n’iwu metụtara sayensi na nke ngosipụta teknụụzụ.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: He even suggests that such abilities in interpreting human behavior may be shared by animals such as domestic dogs.
Igbo:"}]
label: Ọ na-ekwu rịị na ikekwe ụmụ anụmanụ dịka nkịta ụlọ nwekwara ụdịrị ikikere a ịghọta omume mmadụ

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Bipedal specializations are found in Australopithecus fossils from 4.2-3.9 million years ago, although Sahelanthropus may have walked on two legs as early as seven million years ago.
Igbo: Achoputara ọkachamara bipedal na fosil Australopithecus site na nde nde afọ 4.2-3.9 gara aga, o bu ezie na Sahelanthropus nwere ike ije ije n'ukwu abuo na nde afọ asaa gara aga.
English: The females are usually closely related to each other, being a large family of sisters and daughters.
Igbo: Ndị nwanyị na-emetụtakarị nke ukwu n’onwe ha, n’ibu otu nnukwu ezinụlọ nke ụmụnne nwanyị na ụmụ nwa nwanyị.
English: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.
Igbo: Mpaghara jimnasktik nke obodo USA kwadoro nlebara anya nke onwe nke nwere ike igosi ka mmegbu nke ndị lanarịrị ihe mberede Larị Nassar kọwapụtara nwere ike ịbụ ihe metere aka a na-amaghị maka ya na anabatakwa mgbanwe ndị kwesịrị ekwesị.
English: Apia was founded in the 1850s and has been the official capital of Samoa since 1959.
Igbo: E kepụtara Apịa n'afọ ndị 1850; kemgbe 1959, ọ bụ isi obodo Samoa.
English: The Great Pyramid at Giza is the only one of the seven wonders that is still standing today.
Igbo: Oke Piramid na Giza bụ naanị nke ka kwụ taa n'ime ihe itụnanya asaa ahụ.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Twentieth century research has shown that there are two pools of genetic variation: hidden and expressed.
Igbo:"}]
label: Nnyocha na narị afọ nke iri abụọ egosipụtala na enwere ụdịrị genetik variyeshọn abụọ: nke zoro ezo na nke pụtara apụta.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: A curry can be either "dry" or "wet" depending on the amount of liquid.
Igbo: Kọrị nwere ike ịdị "akọrọ" maọbụ dị "mmiri mmiri", ọ dabeere na mmiri dị adị.
English: Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space.
Igbo: Ngwa Kọntrola, nke yiri rimotu onyonyo, na-eji ihe mmetụta abụọ dị n'akụkụ onyonyo achọpụta ọnọdụ ya n'oghere ọbụla nwere akụkụ atọ.
English: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.
Igbo: Oke 802.11n na arụ ọrụ ma na frikwensi nke 2.4Ghz na nke 5.0Ghz.
English: The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone.
Igbo: Ndị uwe ojii Madhya Pradesh weghachitela nkùnụkwụ na ekwentị kengagharị ndị e zuru n'ohi.
English: Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B.
Igbo: Ikwu n'ozuzu, ọ baghị uru ọbụna ị na-ele anya maka ụmụ mbelata maka ochie ndị azụmaahịa ma ọ bụ klaasị-mbụ n'ụmụ njem ụgbọelu ozugbo sitere na A ruo B.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Mutation adds new genetic variation, and selection removes it from the pool of expressed variation.
Igbo:'}]
label: Mgbanwe n'ọdịdị na-agbakwunye ọdịdị kejenetiki ọhụrụ, ma nhọpụta na-ewepụ ya n'ogwu ọdịdị nke a kọwapụtara.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel.
Igbo: Onye otu ya Fenando Alonso nọ n'isi ọsọ ọtụtụ mgbe, mana nke ahụ kwụsịrị mgbe ọ kwụsịrị ụgbọala ya, o nwere ike ịbụ n'ihi ụkwụ ihu ụgbọala a na-etinyeghi nke ọma.
English: He is speculated to make a run for president in 2016.
Igbo: A na-aka na ọ ga-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala n'afọ 2016.
English: Gold may be worked into all sorts of shapes. It can be rolled into tiny shapes.
Igbo: E nwere ike ịrụpụta ọla edo n'ime ụdị ụdịdị niile. E nwere ike ịpịakọta ya n'ime ụdịdị ndị pere mpe.
English: Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space.
Igbo: Afọ ọ bụla, a na-emerụ ọtụtụ ndị nleta ahụ n'ihi na ha enyeghị ezigbo ohere. Ụmụ anụmanụ ndị a buru ibu, azụghịazụ, ma nweekkwa ike ịbụ ihe ize ndụ, ya mere nye ha ohere.
English: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.
Igbo: Ka akara Rossby na-adị obere karịa, ka arụmarụ na-adịkwu obere nke kpakpando n’ikwanye ugwu nye ụmụ ntụgharị nke ihendọta.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Segregation and recombination shuffle variation back and forth between the two pools with each generation.
Igbo:"}]
label: Nkewa na ntughari nkpokorita nkeghari na azu n'etiti ọdọ mmiri abua ahu na ọgbọ o bula.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.
Igbo: Òtù Mmụta Irak ahụ gosipụtara nchọpụta ya na 12.00 GMT taa.
English: The mountains of the Peninsula here merge into the plateau, then re-emerge to form the 360 km chain of the Ellsworth Mountains, bisected by the Minnesota Glacier.
Igbo: Ugwu ndị Peninsụla ahụ nọ ebe a jikọtara ọnụ ịghọ ugwu dị larịị ahụ, mgbe ahụ jikọgharịa ịghọ km 360 eriri igwe nke Ugwu ndị Ellsworth ahụ, egbubiri abụọ site n’aka Glesịa Minnesota ahụ.
English: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.
Igbo: N'ọtụtụ obodo Itali ndị ọzọ ma na uwa nile, ọkachasị na Poland, emere nkwazi dị ka ibe ya, nke ọtụtụ mmadụ hụrụ.
English: To understand the Templars one must understand the context that prompted the creation of the order.
Igbo: Ịghọta ndị Templars, aghaghi ịghọta ọnọdụ nke kpaliri okike nke otu a.
English: Also after the Revolution occupations were open to all male applicants allowing the most ambitious and successful to succeed.
Igbo: Ọzọkwa mgbe ụmụ aka ọrụ Mgbanwe ọchịchị ahụ mepechara maka ụmụ nwoke ọchọ ọrụ niile na-ekwe ka ndị kacha nwee oké ọchịchọ na ihe ịga nke ọma ka ha gaa nke ọma.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Out on the savanna, it is hard for a primate with a digestive system like that of humans to satisfy its amino-acid requirements from available plant resources.
Igbo:"}]
label: N'ime savanna, ọ bụ ihe siri ike na primate nwere usoro nri dị ka nke mmadụ iji mejupụta amino-acid chọrọ site na ihe ọkụkụ dịnụ.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa.
Igbo: Obodo-akuku-mmiri nke ndi Owuwa-anyanwu Africa di na Osimiri India na opupu onu mmiri owuwa-anyanwu Africa.
English: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you).
Igbo: Ụzọ kachasị doo anya nke ife n’ime klaasị mbụ ma ọ bụ azụmahịa bụ iwepụta nnukwu ego maka urūàmàrà (ma ọ bụ, nke ka mma, mee ka ụlọ ọrụ gị mere gị ya).
English: Curtis Cooper, a mathematician and computer science professor at the University of Central Missouri, has discovered the largest known prime number to date on January 25.
Igbo: Curtis Cooper, onye ọka mmụta mgbakọ na mwepụ na onye ọka mmụta sayensị kọmputa na Mahadum nke Etiti Missouri, achọpụtala akara praịm kachasị buo ibu ruo ta na Jenụwarị 25.
English: Feel free to pencil in your own marks, but remember the printed bowing marks are there for a musical reason, so they should usually be respected.
Igbo: Detuo akara nke gị na nwere onwe, mana chetakwa na akara ndị ahụ ebiri ebi nwere uru egwu ha bara, n'ihi nke a ha kwesịrị ka akwanyere ha ugwu.
English: As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times.
Igbo: Dị ka mmetọ keọkụ n'isimbụ ha abụghị ụdị nsogbu ọ bụ ugbu a, a na-ahụkarị ha n'ime obodo ma ọ bụ na kampọs, nke dị mfe irute karịa ndị ahụ arụrụ n'oge ugbu a.

English: Moreover, failure to do so has serious consequences: growth depression, malnutrition, and ultimately death.

label: Ọzọ dịka ibe ya, ị jụ ime ihe a nwere nnukwu ntaramahụhụ: nnukwu ndamụmbà, ọtịtaahụ, nakwa ọnwụ n'ikpeazụ.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Members of a subculture often signal their membership through a distinctive and symbolic use of style, which includes fashions, mannerisms, and argot.
Igbo: Ndịòtù nke otu okpuru omenala na-akpọtụrụkarị ịdị n'òtù ha site n'otu ojiji akanka pụrụ iche ma dịmara, nke gụnyere ụmụ ejiji, omume, na asụsụ ịgba izu.
English: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

English: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions.
Igbo: Tupu Simpsons Simon Ahụ arụọla ọrụ n’ọtụtụ ihe nkiri n’ọkwa dị iche iche.
English: Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict.
Igbo: Moldova mba nwere ọtụtụ-agbụrụ nke nke tagwere ahụhụ sitere na ndọkụrịta agbụrụ.
English: The French Revolution also inspired many other repressed working class people of other country's to began their own revolutions.
Igbo: Mgbanwe France melitere obi ndi oru ana emegbu emegbu no gasi na mba ndi ozo ha ewere wee ike ibido mgbanwe nke ha.

English: Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary.

English: Finland is a great boating destination. The "Land of a thousand lakes" has thousands of islands too, in the lakes and in the coastal archipelagos.

Igbo: Nka na uza n’enye igbo-mkpa nke ime jem site ihu-nanya. Umu-akwukwo nwere ike ilele ihe ngosi n’ulo ngosi, zute ebe izu-azu maobu gosi mmasi nye oru nka dika ha no-odu n’ogige ulo-akwukwo ha.
English: A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables.
Igbo: Curry bu nri eji ngwa nri nke di iche iche esi, ana etinyekwa ya anu ma o bu akwukwo nri.

English: Eventually, wooden wheels were replaced by iron wheels. In 1767, the first full-iron rails were introduced.
Igbo:'}]
label: N'ikpeazụ, eji wiil ígwè dochie wiil osisi. N'afọ 1767, e wepụtara wiil nke mbụ ejị igwe rụọ kpam kpam.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:

English: I don't know if you realize it or not, but most of the goods from Central America came into this country duty-free.

English: In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre.
Igbo: N'afọ 2002, ebibiri Goma site n’aka lava si na ugwu ọkụ Nyiragongo nke liri ọtụtụ n'okporoama obodo, ọ kachasị etiti obodo.
English: These relationships help in planning, design, and operations of roadway facilities.
Igbo: Mmetụta ndị a na-enyere aka n’ime atụmatụ, ncheremee, na arụmọrụ nke akụrụngwa okporo ụzọ ụgbọ ígwè.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: One was sent to George Washington on July 6, who had it read to his troops in New York on July 9. A copy reached London on August 10.
Igbo:"}]
label: Na Julaị 6, e zigaara George Washington otu kọpị, onye mere ka a gụọrọ ya ndị agha ya na Niu Yọk na Julaị 9. Otu kọpị ruru Lọndọn n'Ọgọstụ 10.

messages:

English: The Oyapock River Bridge is a cable-stayed bridge. It spans the Oyapock River to link the cities of Oiapoque in Brazil and Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock in French Guiana.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Atoms are so incredibly tiny that trillions of them could fit into the period at the end of this sentence.

English: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Travellers bound for countries with heavy taxation can sometimes save a considerable amount of money, especially on products such as alcoholic beverages and tobacco.
Igbo: Ndị njem na-aga mba ndị nwere nnukwu ụtụ isi nwere ike mgbe ụfọdụ ichekwa ọkpụrụkpụrụ ego, tụmadị na ngwaahịa dị ka ụmụ ihe ọn̄ụn̄ụ ndị na-aba n'anya na ụtaba.

Igbo: Na 1895, mgbe a dachara n’Agha Sino-Japanese Mbụ (1894-1895), ọchịchị Qing ahụ mere mbịanye aka na Nkwekọrịta nke Shimonoseki ahụ, site na nke o jiri nyefee Japan ọbụbụeze nke Taiwan, nke na-achị agwaetiti ahụ ruo 1945.
English: Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing.

English: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
Igbo: Alaeze Atọ so n'otu n'ime ọgbọ kacha dị egwu n'akụkọ ihe mere na mba Chaịna mgbe gboo. Puku kwuru puku mmadụ nwụrụ n'agha ịnọ n'oche ọchịchị nke kachasị elu na nnukwu obi eze nke dị na Xi'an.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: The Giza Plateau, or "Giza Necropolis" in the Egyptian Valley of the Dead contains several pyramids (of which the great pyramid is the largest), several small tombs, several temples, and the great Sphinx.
Igbo: Ala ugwu Giza maọbụ "Giza Nekropolis" nke dị na ndagwurugwu ọnwụ Ijipt nwere ọtụtụ piramid (nke piramid ukwu bụ nke kachasị ibu), ọtụtụ ebe olili, ọtụtụ ụlọ ofufe nakwa oke Sfinks.
English: The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.
Igbo: A ga-ezìga ozī nyocha nke nkata akpara n'otu weebụsaịtị ọha.
English: Field trips are a large part of any classroom. Quite often a teacher would love to take her students places to which a bus trip is not an option.
Igbo: Njem fild bụ otu nnukwu akụkụ nke klaasị ọ bụla. Ọtụtụ mgbe ọ na-amasị otu onye nkuzi ịkpọrọ ụmụ akwụkwọ ya gaa ebe ndị njem bọọsụ esoghị na nhọrọ ya.
English: Blogs can also help improve student writing. While students often begin their blog experience with sloppy grammar and spelling, the presence of an audience generally changes that.
Igbo: Ụmụ blọọgụ nwerekwara ike inye aka imelite ederede nwa akwụkwọ. Dị ka ụmụ akwụkwọ na-ebidokarị ahụmihe blọọgụ ha n'iji ụtọasụsụ na nsụpe na-adịghị nke ọma, ọnụnọ nke ndị nkiri na-agbanwekarị nke ahụ.
English: At the other end of the spectrum, one morphs into an unrecognizable individual that feels he or she must change everything the team has been doing and make it their own.
Igbo: Na njedebe ọzọ nke ụdị ahụ, otu onye ahụ ga-aghọ wụrụ mmadụ a na agali amata nke na- eche na ọ ga-agbanwerịrị ihe niile otu ahụ na- eme ma mee ka ọ bụrụ nke ha.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:

English: Subcultures can be distinctive because of the age, ethnicity, class, location, and/or gender of the members.

English: The "up bow" mark looks like a V and the "down bow mark" like a staple or a square missing its bottom side.
Igbo: Akara “ụta elu” ahụ yiri otu V ma akara “ụta ala” ahụ yiri otu stepụlụ ma ọ bụ otu ǹkomgbaànoǹhà nke tufure ebe okpuru ya.
English: 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch.
Igbo: 34 nime-otu-nari-nile bu ndi tinyere aka na ntuli aka ahu n’enwe otu uche ahu, n’acho ka Eze-nwanyi Elizabeth II buru onye eze nke ikpeazu nke Australia.
English: Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.
Igbo: Mgbalị ị na-achọ saịtị okuku ahụ na-emebi ihu igwe site na ihu igwe dị njọ na ala siri ike.
English: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.
Igbo: Mgbe ọbụla ụmụ obere ihe dị ndụ (obere ọnụ ọgụgụ yiri onwe ha) si na ndị otu ha pụọ (dịka ha gafee ugwu, osimiri, maọbụ gaa n'agwaetiti ọzọ ebe ọ ga-ara ahụ isi laghachi) ha ga-achọta onwe ha na gburugburu di iche ọtụtụ mgbe.
English: These theories look at what it is about certain people that make them want the things that they do and what things in their environment will make them do or not do certain things.
Igbo: Tiori ndị a na-eleba anya n'ihe gbasara ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ nke kpatara ha ji achọ ihe ndị ha chọrọ na kedu ụmụ ihe nọ na gburugburu ebe obibi ha ga-eme ha mee ma ọ bụ emela ụfọdụ ihe.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Sharing a field trip virtually is also a great way to reflect a on a trip and share experiences with future classes.
Igbo:'}]
label: Ịkekọrịta njem site na kọmputa bụkwa otu ụzọ dị mma iji chee echiche na njem ma kekọrịta ahụmahụ nye klas ndị nke ọdịnihu.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict.
Igbo: Moldova mba nwere ọtụtụ-agbụrụ nke nke tagwere ahụhụ sitere na ndọkụrịta agbụrụ.
English: The terrified King Louis XVI, Queen Marie Antoinette their two young children (11 year old Marie Therese and four year old Louis-Charles) and the King's sister, Madam Elizabeth, on the 6th October 1789 were forced back to Paris from Versailles by a mob of market women.
Igbo: N'Oktoba 6, 1789, ụmụ nwanyị ahịa iwe ji yiri Eze Luwi XVI oke egwu mgbe ha si na Versailles dọrọ ya, nwunye ya Marịa Antwanet, obere ụmụ ha abụọ (Marịa Teriza dị afọ 11 na Luwi-Chals dị afọ anọ), na nwanne nwanyị Eze, Madam Elizabet, dọghachi ha na Parii.
English: Feel free to pencil in your own marks, but remember the printed bowing marks are there for a musical reason, so they should usually be respected.
Igbo: Detuo akara nke gị na nwere onwe, mana chetakwa na akara ndị ahụ ebiri ebi nwere uru egwu ha bara, n'ihi nke a ha kwesịrị ka akwanyere ha ugwu.
English: Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed.
Igbo: N'agbanyeghị na ọ dị ka ndị na emegide ha bụ ndị ndịda ka ha mma, ndị mba Sawụt Afrịka melitere nwayọ nwayọ ka ịsọ mpi gara n'ihu.
English: Searches at security checkpoints have also become far more intrusive in the post-September 11, 2001 era.
Igbo: Ọchịchọ na ebe nyocha nchedo abụrụkwala oke nsogbu mbanye n’ike n’ime oge Septemba 11, 2001 gachara.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: For example, each year students from Bennet School in North Carolina design a website about their trip to the State Capital, each year the website gets remodeled, but old versions are kept online to serve as a scrapbook.
Igbo:"}]
label: Na imaatu, kwa afo umu-akwukwo sitere Ulo-akwukwo Bennet di na mpaghara ugwu Carolina na aruputa otu websaiti banyere njem ha na Isi Obodo, kwa afo aga arozihari websaiti a, mana aga edowe udidi ochie ya na ikuku iru oru dika akwukwo-efu.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet.
Igbo: Ndị ọgụ egwu ama ama n’obodo niile bụkuru bhajan, maọbụ abụ ofufe, nye ụkwụ Shri Shyam.
English: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set.
Igbo: Emeriri Murray na seti nke mbu na ndorondoro njirimara onye mmeri mgbe umu nwoke abuo jidere bolu ọ bụla n’ime setị.
English: During the 1920s, the prevailing attitudes of most citizens and nations was that of pacifism and isolation.
Igbo: N'oge afọ ndi 1920, agwa kachasị dị ebe nile n'etiti ndị mba dị iche iche bụ nke ịchọ udo na nnọrọ onwe.
English: In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
Igbo: Na Japan, Onye eze Emperọ haziri mmemme mkpụrụ osisi cheri izizi maka naanị ya na ndị otu ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka ọchịchị Ụlọ ikpe etiti.
English: As a result, the process of an organization working together to overcome an obstacle can lead to a new innovative process to serve the customer's need.
Igbo: N'ihi nke a, usoro nke otu ụlọọrụ ịrụkọta ọrụ ọnụ iji merie otu ihe mgbochi nwere ike idunyeru otu usoro nkpepụta ihe ọhụrụ iji jee ozi nke mkpa onye ahịa.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Blogs can also help improve student writing. While students often begin their blog experience with sloppy grammar and spelling, the presence of an audience generally changes that.
Igbo:"}]
label: Ụmụ blọọgụ nwerekwara ike inye aka imelite ederede nwa akwụkwọ. Dị ka ụmụ akwụkwọ na-ebidokarị ahụmihe blọọgụ ha n'iji ụtọasụsụ na nsụpe na-adịghị nke ọma, ọnụnọ nke ndị nkiri na-agbanwekarị nke ahụ.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Appropriate use of blogs "can empower students to become more analytical and critical; through actively responding to Internet materials, students can define their positions in the context of others' writings as well as outline their own perspectives on particular issues (Oravec, 2002).
Igbo: Ojiji kwesịrị ekwesị nke ụmụ blọọgụ "nwere ike inye ụmụ akwụkwọ ike iji dịkwuo na kennyocha na ichekwu echiche; site n'ịza ọsịsọ n'ụmụ ihe ịntaneet, ụmụ akwụkwọ nwere ike ịkọwa ọnọdụ ha na nghọta nke ụmụ ederede ndị ọzọ ya na kwupụtachaa uche onwe ha n'ụmụ nsogbu pụrụ iche (Oravec, 2002).
English: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships.
Igbo: N’ofe mmemme Wednesdee ahụ, Carpanedo zọrọ asọmpi n’ọsọ ụgbọala abụọ n’Asọmpi Iko ahụ.
English: Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas.
Igbo: N'oge na-adịghị anya, ndị ọrụ uwe ojii ejikere na gịa ogbaaghara batara n'ime yad ahụ ma jiri gaasị anya mmiri wee gbakọta ndị mkpọrọ n’otu ebe.
English: Thousands of years ago, a man called Aristarchus said that the Solar System moved around the Sun.
Igbo: Ọtụtụ puku afọ gara aga, otu nwoke a kpọrọ Aristarchus kwuru si na Usoro Mbara Igwe nọ na-agagharị gburugburu Anyanwụ.
English: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.
Igbo: Ring dozikwara otu ikpe ha na ụlọ ọrụ ọzọ na-ahụ maka nchekwa, ADT Corporation nwere.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Since students are often the most critical audience, the blog writer begins to strive to improve writing to avoid criticism.
Igbo:'}]
label: Ebe ọ bụ na ụmụ akwụkwọ na-abụkarị ndị nkiri kachasị mkpa, odee blọọgụ ahụ na-amalite ịgbalị imelite odide ya iji zere nkatọ.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:

Igbo: Akwammiri Osimiri Oyapock bụ otu akwa mmiri ejiri kebùl runye ya. Ọ gbara gburugburu Osimiri Oyapock iji jikọọ ụmụ obodo nke Oiapoque n'ime Brazịl na Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock n'ime French Guiana.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.
Igbo: USA Jimnastiks kwadoro ozi Olimpik Kọmitii Amerịka dere ma kwere kwa na oge eruola mgbe onye ọbụla na-eme Olimpiks aghaghị ịrụkọ ọrụ ọnụ ịhụ na ndị egwuregwu anyị niile nọ na nchekwa.
English: Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there.
Igbo: N'ihi tọpọlọjì nke okpuru mmiri ahụ, mmiri na-abanyeghachi dị ike n'akụkụ ole na ole miri emi, ma ike ọwụwụ mmiri ngwa ngwa ruo na mmiri dị omimi nwere ike ịmepụta n'ebe ahụ.
English: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.
Igbo: Anyi kwere na ihe USOC dere na odimma ndi egwuregwu anyi na klob ha nakwa egwuregwu ga enweta uru n’ihu karia ma o buru na enwe mgbanwe n’ulo oru anyi kama inapu ndi mmadu asambodo ha.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
Igbo: biko cheta na ebe ina aga izute bu n’ezie ogige eliri otutu ozu, dika kwa nwere ihe-oputara ana agaghi agutali onu nye okere onu-ogugu uwa putara-ihe
English: Built by the Egyptians in the third century BCE, the Great Pyramid is one of many large pyramid structures built to honor dead Pharaoh.
Igbo: Ndị Ijipt rụrụ n’ime narị afọ atọ BCE, Oke Piramidi ahụ otu n’ime ọtụtụ nnukwu ihe ọwụwụ piramidi arụrụ ịkwanye Fero nwụrụ ugwu.
English: Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.
Igbo: Gburugburu Medina ochie ahụ ọ dị mfe ịchọta ebe ndị na-ere ụmụ ngwaahịa ọdịnala Ndị Moroko, dị ka ụmụ tagịnị, ite akpụrụ akpụ, ngwaahịa ejiri akpụkpọ anụ mee, huuka, na giigawụ nke ụdịdị dị iche iche zuru ezu, mana ha nille bụ maka ndị nleta.
English: The surface of the Moon is made of rocks and dust. The outer layer of the Moon is called the crust.
Igbo: Elu ọnwa bụ ụmụ okwute na ájá mejupụtara ya. Mkpuchi mpụga ọnwa ka a na-akpọ krọstụ.
English: Alloys are basically a mixture of two or more metals. Don't forget that there are many elements on the periodic table.
Igbo: Ụmụ alọị bụgodu mwurikọta ígwè abụọ ma ọ bụ karịa. Echefula na e nwere ọtụtụ njìmebe nọ na tebụlụ pirịọdik.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages.
Igbo:"}]
label: Ndị nnọchi anya ndị njem na-enyekarị ụmụ ngwungwu na-agụnye nri ụtụtụ, nhazi ụzọ esi eje njem ịga na/site na ọdụ ụgbọelu ma ọ bụ njem ụgbọelu etikọrọ ọnụ ya na ụmụ ngwungwu họteelụ.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany.
Igbo: N'ime nanị izu abụọ ndị agha America na Ndị French nke Nweere onwe ha emeela ka ndịda France nwere onwe ha ma wee na-atụgharị echewe ihu na Germany.
English: Crossties were introduced fairly early to hold the tracks in place. Gradually, however, it was realised that tracks would be more efficient if they had a stip of iron on the top.
Igbo: Ebidoro mgbe gboo were krọstaị na-arụ ụzọ ụgbọoloko ka o were gbasie ike. Obere obere a bịa mata na ụzọ ụgbọoloko ga-esikarị ike ma ọ bụrụ na o nweturu obere igwe n’elu ya.
English: Sometimes special pyramid shaped towers, called ziggurats, were built to be a part of the temples.
Igbo: Ụfọdụ oge a na arụnye ụlọ elu nwere oyiyi oiramid, ndị akpọrọ ziggurats, ka ha bụrụ osonye ụlọ okpukpe.
English: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines.
Igbo: Otu onye Filipino wụbụrụ onye uwe ojii edobela ndị njem nleta Hong Kong na njigide site n’ịkwụsị n’ike bọọsụ ha n’ime Manila, isiobodo nke ndị Filipaịnụ.
English: While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is "bien élevé" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier.
Igbo: Mgbe nke a na-abụkarị naanị nhụnuche na-ezighị ezi, ụzọ kachasị mma iji na-aga n’ihu n’ime Parii bụ na ị nọ n’omume gị kachasị mma, na-eme ka onye bụ "bien élevé" (a zụrụ nke ọma). Ọ ga-eme ka ngagharị n’ebe ahụ kara dị mfe.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa).
Igbo:'}]
label: Ha nwekwara ike idobere gị ohere a ma ọ bụrụ na ị ka chọrọ oge ịtụgharị uche na ya maọbụ ịnweta akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ maka ebe ị na-aga (ọmụmaatụ: visa).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent.
Igbo: Ndị nnọchi anya ndị njem na-enwekarị nkwekọ azụmahịa ha na kpọmkwem ụmụ họteelụ, agbanyeghị na ị nwere ike ịhụ na o kwere omume itinye akwụkwọ maka ụdị nnabata ndị ọzọ, dị ka ala ebe a na-ama ụlọikwu, sitere n'otu onye nnọchite anya njem.
English: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times.
Igbo: Yurop bụ kọntinent dị obere na mmetụta ma nwee ọtụtụ mba nwere onwe ha. N’okpuru ọnọdụ nkịtị, ime njem gafee ọtụtụ mba ga-apụta ị ga site na ntinye akwụkwọ maka visa na njikwa paspọọtụ ọtụtụ oge.
English: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.
Igbo: A na-ejikọta ọnụ ọnwụnwụ ọkụ na ntụgharị ya amata akara Rossby nke otu kpakpando, nke metụtara na ọwụwụ plasma.
English: After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich.
Igbo: Ka akara omume pụtara, Gingrich kelere Santorum, mana ọ gwara Rọmni okwu ike, n'ihi ụdịrị mkpọsa ozi ọ kpọsara megide Gringrich na Ayowa.
English: Apia is the capital of Samoa. The town is on the island of Upolu and has a population of just under 40,000.
Igbo: Apia bụ isi obodo Samoa. Obodo ahụ nọ n'agwaetiti Upolu ma ma nwee ngụpụta mmadụ nke ji obere ihe ghara eru 40,000.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.
Igbo:"}]
label: Ihe ọbụla a chọrọ ịgbanwe maọbụ ịna, ọ bụ onye ejenti njem ka a ga-ebu ụzọ gakwuru; ọ bụghị họteelụ n'onwe ya.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Lion prides act much like packs of wolves or dogs, animals surprisingly similar to lions (but not other big cats) in behavior, and also very deadly to their prey.
Igbo: Ezinụlọ Ọdụm na-akpa agwa ka ezinụlọ oke nkịta ọhịa maọbụ nkịta ụlọ, anụ ndị nwere oyiyi dị ịtụ n'anya nye Ọdụm (mana odịghị otu a n'ebe nnukwu nwamba ndị ọzọ nọ) n'omume, ma bụrụ ihe oke iyi egwu nye ihe ọbụla ha na-achụ na nta.
English: Technology offers the solution with virtual field trips. Students can look at museum artifacts, visit an aquarium, or admire beautiful art while sitting with their class.
Igbo: Nka na uza n’enye igbo-mkpa nke ime jem site ihu-nanya. Umu-akwukwo nwere ike ilele ihe ngosi n’ulo ngosi, zute ebe izu-azu maobu gosi mmasi nye oru nka dika ha no-odu n’ogige ulo-akwukwo ha.
English: New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.
Igbo: O juru ndị Niu Kịngdọm Ijipt mgbe ochie anya ihe ncheta ndị bu ha ụzọ, nke gaferela otu puku afọ mgbe ahụ.
English: Check the label for specific first aid instructions for that specific poison.
Igbo: Lelee nnyeàhà ahụ maka ntụziaka mgbata ọsọ enyemaka mbụ akọwapụtara maka nsi ahụ akọwapụtara.
English: You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.
Igbo: Ị nwere ike iji boda-boda (tagzi ọgba tum tum) ịga gburugburu Goma. Ọnụahịa nkịtị (ebeụlọ) bụ Francs Ndị Congo ~500 maka ọkwụkwọ dị mkpirikpi.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience.
Igbo:"}]
label: Maka ụfọdụ mmemme, nnukwu ọtụtụ n’ime ndị bịara na mmemme egwu ahụ kpebiri ịnọ na kampụ n’ebe ahụ, ma ọtụtụ n’ime ndị bịara na-ewe ya otu akụkụ dị oke mkpa nke ahụmihe ahụ.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar.
Igbo: Oke ọchịchị mmiri bụ mmiri na-asọlata asọlata site n'ebili mmiri tikapụrụ n'ọnụ, na-emekarị n'okwute ala mmiri maọbụ ihe yiri ya.
English: Scaffolding is not a method of learning but rather an aid that provides support to individuals whom are undergoing a new learning experience such as using a new computer program or beginning a new project.
Igbo: Skafoldin abụghị usoro mmụta kama ọ bụ enyemaka na-akwado ndị na-amụ ihe ọhụrụ dịka iji program ọhụrụ arụ ọrụ na kọmputa maọbụ ibido ọrụ ọhụrụ
English: British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted.
Igbo: A ga-anabata n’izugbe pam ndị Britenụ ebe ọbụla n’ime agwaetiti ndị ahụ ma na gburugburu ụmụ kaadị mbiri ego Stanley na dọla mba Amerịka sokwa na ndị a na-anabata.
English: In 1884, Tesla moved to the United States of America to accept a job with the Edison Company in New York City.
Igbo: N'afọ 1884, Tesla kwagara na mba Amerịka ịnara ọrụ na nke Ụlọ ọrụ Edison n'Obodo Niu Yọk.
English: Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets.
Igbo: A sị na ozuzu ohi gara n'ihu ogologo abalị niile, n'ihi na ndị ọrụ mmanye iwu anọghị n'okporo ama Bishkek.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music.
Igbo:"}]
label: Ọ bụrụ na ị chọrọ ịnọ nso na emereme ahụ ị ga-ekwesị ịbanye ọsịịsọ iji nweta otu ebe a na-ama ụlọikwu nọ nso n'egwu ahụ.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Though each country was 'Scandinavian', there were many differences between the people, kings, customs and history of Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Iceland.
Igbo: N'agbanyeghị na obodo ọbụla bụ 'mba Skandinevia', enwere ọtụtụ ihe dị iche n'etiti ndị, ndị eze, omenala, na akụkọ ihe mere na Denmak, Swiden, Nọọwe na Aisland.
English: Each temple had an open temple courtyard and then an inner sanctuary that only the priests could enter.
Igbo: Ulo-uka n’otu n’otu nwere mbara-ezi ulo-uka ma nwekazie ime ebe nchuaja ebe nani onye-isi nchu-aja nwere-ike ibanye.
English: Children are placed in Foster Care for a wide variety of reasons that range from neglect, to abuse, and even to extortion.
Igbo: Enwere ọtụtụ ihe e ji akpọga ụmụ aka ka onye ọzọ lekọta ha, dịka nleghara anya, mmegbu, nakwa nnapụ ihe.
English: More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.
Igbo: Ọtụtụ ụlọụka agba ochie na-amụkarị anya abalị Ista n'abalị Satọde n'oge ngwụcha izu Ista, ebe ndị ụka na-abanye na mmemme ma ọ kụọ elekere abụọ nke etiti abalị iji mee mmemme mbilite n'ọnwụ Kraịstị.
English: Apia was founded in the 1850s and has been the official capital of Samoa since 1959.
Igbo: E kepụtara Apịa n'afọ ndị 1850; kemgbe 1959, ọ bụ isi obodo Samoa.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night.
Igbo:"}]
label: Cheta na obu ezie na egwu ogbo-egwu nwere ike gwula, enwere ike inwe mpaghara mmeme ahu gana aku egwu ruo ime abali.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: While most of their food would be familiar to us, Romans did have their share of strange or unusual feast items, including wild boar, peacock, snails, and a type of rodent called a dormouse
Igbo: Ka anyị maara nke ọma imirikiti nri ha, ndị Rom nwere oke ha na ihe erimeeri ijuanya ma ọ bụ pụrụ iche, gụnyere ezi ọhịa, piikọkụ, ejula, na ụdị oke akpọrọ dormouse.
English: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead.
Igbo: Mgbe Septemba 17, 1939 ruru, a kutuola nchekwa ndị Poland; naanị olileanya ha nwere bụ ịlaghachi tụọ atụmatụ ọzọ n'akụkụ isi briij Romenia.
English: Accepted were Aristotle's views on all matters of science, including psychology.
Igbo: A nabatara echiche Aristotle gbasara okwu sayensi niile ma mmuta akparamagwa ya bu psychology
English: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.
Igbo: Ọrụ arụrụ bụkarịrị nke iwu a ka na enyocha enyocha, mana edere usoro omume ihe ahụ ka o gosipụta ihe ahụtara ụyọkọ kpakpando Sajiterius.
English: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education.
Igbo: Ọbzavetrị ndị oge gara aga anaghị abachazi uru taa; e jizi ha eme ụlọ ndokwa ihe nka maọbụ ebe mmụta.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.
Igbo:"}]
label: Ụfọdụ ememme nwere ebe ndị a na-ama ụlọikwuu pụrụ iche maka ezinụlọ nke nwere ụmụ na-eto eto.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.
Igbo: N'ọtụtụ obodo Itali ndị ọzọ ma na uwa nile, ọkachasị na Poland, emere nkwazi dị ka ibe ya, nke ọtụtụ mmadụ hụrụ.
English: Also after the Revolution occupations were open to all male applicants allowing the most ambitious and successful to succeed.
Igbo: Ọzọkwa mgbe ụmụ aka ọrụ Mgbanwe ọchịchị ahụ mepechara maka ụmụ nwoke ọchọ ọrụ niile na-ekwe ka ndị kacha nwee oké ọchịchọ na ihe ịga nke ọma ka ha gaa nke ọma.
English: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.
Igbo: Ụmụ oke ifufe, mkpụrụ mmiri, oke mmiri ozuzo, na ọkụọhịa bụ ụmụ ụdị na mmetụta nke ihu igwe dị oke njọ, dị ka ụmụ egbe eluigwe mmiri ozuzo, ajọọ̀ oke ifufe, ajọọ̀ ifufe mmiri, na ajọọ̀ oke mmiri ozuzo.
English: Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.
Igbo: Ụmụ akwụkwọ na magaziini ndị na-akọ maka nlanarị nke ọzara juru eju, mana ụmụ mbipụta na-akọ maka ebe a na-alụ agha dị obere.
English: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
Igbo: Ọ bụ esemokwu maka mmefu ego na nkwado na nrụgharị e mere mgbe Oke ikuku Katrina gasịrị kpatara arụmụka a; ụfọdụ ndị kweere na iji nwayọ emefụ ego steeti akọwaala mmefụ a n'ụzọ ntọrọmọchị dịka "Nkwekọrịta Niu Ọlịns nke Bush mere".
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected.
Igbo:'}]
label: Mgbe ị na-agafe Ebe ugwu Baltic n’oge oyi, lelee ebe kabịn ahụ, dị ka ịgafe okwute mmiri na-akpata mkpọtụ dị nnọọ egwu maka ndị ọ kacha metụta.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: There are a lot of social and political effects such as the use of metric system, a shift from absolutism to republicanism, nationalism and the belief the country belongs to the people not to one sole ruler.
Igbo: Nke a butere ọtụtụ mmetụta na mmekọ mmadụ na ibe ya makwa na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dika usoro agụm ọnụ, mgbanwe site n'ọchịchị okwu otu onye gaa na nke okwu mba, nke obodo na nkwenye na obodo bụ nke ọha karịa ịbụ nke otu onye ọchịchị.
English: This is especially popular with school leavers, allowing them to take a year out before university, without compromising their education.
Igbo: Ọ bụ ndị si ụlọ akwụkwọ pụta na-emekarị nke a, maka ọ na-ekwe ka ha jiri otu afọ zuo ike tupu ha abanye mahadum, ma ghara imebi mmụta ha.
English: There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better.
Igbo: Enwere ọtụtụ mmanya si Frans mmadụ ga-aṅụ, mana mmanya Niu Ziland na Ọstrelia ga-aka mma maka njem.
English: Appropriate use of blogs "can empower students to become more analytical and critical; through actively responding to Internet materials, students can define their positions in the context of others' writings as well as outline their own perspectives on particular issues (Oravec, 2002).
Igbo: Ojiji kwesịrị ekwesị nke ụmụ blọọgụ "nwere ike inye ụmụ akwụkwọ ike iji dịkwuo na kennyocha na ichekwu echiche; site n'ịza ọsịsọ n'ụmụ ihe ịntaneet, ụmụ akwụkwọ nwere ike ịkọwa ọnọdụ ha na nghọta nke ụmụ ederede ndị ọzọ ya na kwupụtachaa uche onwe ha n'ụmụ nsogbu pụrụ iche (Oravec, 2002).
English: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise.
Igbo: Enwere ọdịnala maka ịmụ anya n'abalị Ista n'ebe mepere emepe iji hụ ọwụwa anyanwụ.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).
Igbo:'}]
label: Njem nnyagharị nke Senti Piitasbọg gụnyere oge n'ime obodo. Ndị njem nke njem nnyagharị bụ ndị ewezụgara site n'ụmụ ihe ndị achọrọ maka visa (lelee usoro ahụ).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Typically there will be a tuition fee to enroll in these educational programs.
Igbo: A ga-enwekarị ụgwọ akwụkwọ iji debanye aha n’ime ụmụ emume mmụta ndị a.
English: During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show.
Igbo: N'afọ ndị 1980, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ihe ngosi dị ka Tagzi, Cheers, ya na ihe ngosi Tresi Ullman.
English: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."
Igbo: A kọbụrụ na ọ nọ n’ime ụmụ afọiri abụọ ya. N’otu nkwupụta, Bieber siri "Agbanyeghị na ọ nọghị ma ọ sonyeghị ozugbo ọdachi ihe mberede okporo ụzọ a, echiche na ekpere m nonyere ezinụlọ ndị onye a tara ahụhụ."
English: You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.

English: Be careful not to allow fabric to become too hot (which can cause shrinkage, or in extreme cases, scorch).

English: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement.

Igbo: Ala ugwu Giza maọbụ "Giza Nekropolis" nke dị na ndagwurugwu ọnwụ Ijipt nwere ọtụtụ piramid (nke piramid ukwu bụ nke kachasị ibu), ọtụtụ ebe olili, ọtụtụ ụlọ ofufe nakwa oke Sfinks.
English: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: But being placed in the "high tropics" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely).
Igbo: Mana ị na-edobe gị n'ime "ebe ndị na-ekpo oke ọkụ" ị ga-achọ naanị digiri ole na ole n'ugwu nke ikwuetọ imeso ma ekpomọkụ (mgbe niile) ma anwụ siri ike (mgbe elu igwe kpochara ekpocha, nke kara raa ahụ omume).
English: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.
Igbo: Nzukọ omeiwu bidoro ikwado nnyocha ihe ndị dị aṅaa na fiskal n'afọ 2005 ma kwukwaa kpọmkwem na ngalaba FBI ga ewepụtarịrị ndị ozi iri maka ihe ngosi na-akpali agụụ mmekọrịta nwoke na nwanyị.
English: No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center.
Igbo: Mpaghara mba Yunaịted Steeti na-ahụ maka mmegharị ala (USGS) na mpaghara nke na-ezite ozi gbasara ala ọma jijiji enwetabeghị mkpesa ihe mmebi.
English: Finally, there are many small cats (including loose pet cats) that eat the far more numerous small prey like insects, rodents, lizards, and birds.
Igbo: N’ikpeazụ, e nwere ọtụtụ obere nwamba (gụnyere anụ ụlọ nwamba furu efu) na-eri ọtụtụ obere ụmụ anụmanụ dị ka ụmụ ahụhụ, oke, ngwere, na nnụnụ.
English: Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son.
Igbo: Adekọya anọrọla n'Ụlọ ikpe Obodo Edịnbọg ebe eboro ya ebubo maka igbu nwa ya nwoke.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.
Igbo:'}]
label: Uche ndị e gosipụtara na-esekarị n'elu, n'izugbe na ntọghasị dị ukwuu ma a tụnyere ya ozi ndị a kọwara nke ọma dị ebe ọzọ.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: The rise of new technologies allows us to see and investigate brain structures and processes never seen before.
Igbo: Mmụbanye nke ụmụ teknụzụ ọhụrụ na-enye anyị ohere ịhụ ma nyochaa ọdịdị na arụmarụ ụbụrụ nke a na-ahụbeghị mbụ.
English: After all, the leader is ultimately responsible for the success and failure of the team.
Igbo: Kaosiladị, onye ndu ahụ bụ ya ka ọ dịịrị n'ikpeazụ ịhụ maka ọdịmma na ọdịda nke òtù ahụ.
English: Many observed rhythms in physiology and behavior often crucially depend on the presence of endogenous cycles and their production through biological clocks.
Igbo: Ọtụtụ usoro a na-ahụ na fisiọlọji na omume na-adabere ọtụtụ mgbe n'usoro ime ahụ na mmepụta ha site n'elekere nke ime ahụ.
English: The 35mm format is actually, somewhat confusingly, 36mm in width by 24mm in height.
Igbo: Ọ dịtụ mgbagwoju anya na, n'ezie, ụdịdị 35mm nwere 36mm n'obosara na 24mm n'ogo.
English: The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said.
Igbo: Ndị nchọpụta na mahadum sị na ihe ndị a na-emekorịta imepụta mkpụrụ nwere ike ịkwụsị ọrụ akụrụ.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Severe weather is the generic term for any dangerous weather phenomenon with the potential to cause damage, serious social disruption, or loss of human life.
Igbo:"}]
label: Ajọ ihu igwe bụ aha izugbe a na-akpọ ihe ọbụla gbasara ihu igwe nke nwere ike imebi ihe, ghasaa mmekọrịta, maọbụ gbuo mmadụ.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
Igbo: E kwuputara nke a mgbe Trump na Onyeisiala mba Tọkị bụ Rejep Tayyip Erdoghan nwechara mkparịtaụka n'ekwentị.
English: In fact, it is not easy to find at all even if one knew it existed. Once inside the cave, it is a total isolation.
Igbo: N'ezie, ọ dịghị mfe maọlị ịchọta, ọbụrụgodi na mmadụ maara na ọ dị. Ozugbo abanyere n'ime ọgba ahụ, ọ bụ ndịpụ kpam kpam.
English: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa.
Igbo: Obodo-akuku-mmiri nke ndi Owuwa-anyanwu Africa di na Osimiri India na opupu onu mmiri owuwa-anyanwu Africa.
English: No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center.
Igbo: Mpaghara mba Yunaịted Steeti na-ahụ maka mmegharị ala (USGS) na mpaghara nke na-ezite ozi gbasara ala ọma jijiji enwetabeghị mkpesa ihe mmebi.
English: Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status.
Igbo: Ụmụ nwanyị: Ọ bụ ihe akwadoro na ndị njem nwanyị ọ bụla kwuo na ha alụọla dị, n'agbanyeghị etu ọnọdụ ha dị n'ezie.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Severe weather can occur anywhere in the world, and there are different types of it, which can depend on geography, topography, and atmospheric conditions.
Igbo:"}]
label: Ihu igwe dị oke njọ nwere ike ime n'ebe ọbụla n'ụwa, ma o nwere ụdị dị iche iche, nke nwere ike idabere na ọdịdịala, ọdịdịebe na ọnọdụ keikuku.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions.
Igbo: Tupu Simpsons Simon Ahụ arụọla ọrụ n’ọtụtụ ihe nkiri n’ọkwa dị iche iche.
English: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
Igbo: Nhazi nku ha gosiri na ha ejighi ya efe efe kama ha ji ya edokwa okpomọkụ maọbụ eme ihe ngosi. Ndị nchọpụta ihe tụrụ aro sị na, n'agbanyeghị na nke a bụ ọdụ daịnosọ na-eto eto, ihe ngosi ahụ gosiri nku anụ tochara etocha na-abụghị nku nwa anụ.
English: As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally.
Igbo: Ozugbo ị na-esi n'ọwụwụ mmiri ahụ pụta, igwughachi azụ na-aka ara ahụ karịa na nkịtị.
English: Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.
Igbo: Na mmata ihe, n'agbanyeghị, ọrụ ekwentị mkpààgagharị ka dị ike ebe a karịa ọtụtụ ogologo ụzọ ndị ọzọ ahụ, dịka ọmụmaatụ Ọhịa Pennsylvania ahụ.
English: The use of video recording has led to important discoveries in the interpretation of micro-expressions, facial movements which last a few milliseconds.
Igbo: Ojiji nke ndekọ vidio edugawo na ụmụ nchọpụta dị mkpa n’ime nkọwa nke nzipụta-n’ihu-kentakịrị, mmegharị ihu nke na-anọru milisekọnd ole na ole.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.
Igbo:"}]
label: Ụmụ oke ifufe, mkpụrụ mmiri, oke mmiri ozuzo, na ọkụọhịa bụ ụmụ ụdị na mmetụta nke ihu igwe dị oke njọ, dị ka ụmụ egbe eluigwe mmiri ozuzo, ajọọ̀ oke ifufe, ajọọ̀ ifufe mmiri, na ajọọ̀ oke mmiri ozuzo.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.
Igbo: O mebiri ụfọdụ ụzọ, kwụsịtụ njem ụgbọ oloko n'ebe ndị o metụtara, ma ọdụ ụgbọelu Ishikawa ka mechiri emechi.
English: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.
Igbo: O kwughi oke a ga-akwụ, kama ọ sị na a ga-ele anya na nrụpụta akụ na ụba China wee kwụọ ụgwọ.
English: Minor cultures often vanish without leaving relevant historic evidence and fail to be recognized as proper civilizations.
Igbo: Ụmụ obere ọdịnala na-apụ n'anya na-ahapụghị ihe akaebe dị mkpa ya mere anaghị ahụta ha dị ka sivilaịzeshọn kwesịrị ekwesị.
English: Many observed rhythms in physiology and behavior often crucially depend on the presence of endogenous cycles and their production through biological clocks.
Igbo: Ọtụtụ usoro a na-ahụ na fisiọlọji na omume na-adabere ọtụtụ mgbe n'usoro ime ahụ na mmepụta ha site n'elekere nke ime ahụ.
English: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected.
Igbo: Mgbe ị na-agafe Ebe ugwu Baltic n’oge oyi, lelee ebe kabịn ahụ, dị ka ịgafe okwute mmiri na-akpata mkpọtụ dị nnọọ egwu maka ndị ọ kacha metụta.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Regional and seasonal severe weather phenomena include blizzards, snowstorms, ice storms, and dust storms.
Igbo:"}]
label: Ihe ihu igwe siri ike na-eme na mpaghara na n'oge ụfọdụ gụnyere blizadị, oke ikuku na ọdịda ibubeoyi, oke ikuku na ọdịda aịzị, na oke ifufe na-ebu aja.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise.

English: Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: For example, each year students from Bennet School in North Carolina design a website about their trip to the State Capital, each year the website gets remodeled, but old versions are kept online to serve as a scrapbook.
Igbo: Na imaatu, kwa afo umu-akwukwo sitere Ulo-akwukwo Bennet di na mpaghara ugwu Carolina na aruputa otu websaiti banyere njem ha na Isi Obodo, kwa afo aga arozihari websaiti a, mana aga edowe udidi ochie ya na ikuku iru oru dika akwukwo-efu.
English: Scaffolding is not a method of learning but rather an aid that provides support to individuals whom are undergoing a new learning experience such as using a new computer program or beginning a new project.
Igbo: Skafoldin abụghị usoro mmụta kama ọ bụ enyemaka na-akwado ndị na-amụ ihe ọhụrụ dịka iji program ọhụrụ arụ ọrụ na kọmputa maọbụ ibido ọrụ ọhụrụ
English: However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.
Igbo: Mana, o gbughi oge ka atụmatụ a niile laa n'efu, mgbe ihe karịrị ndị Sọviet Yunịọn Red Amị 800,000 banyere, kepụta ogige agha ndị Belarụs na Yukren, ka ha wakpochara akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ Poland na nnupu isi nye Nkwekọrịta Udo Riga, Nkwekọrịta Udo Sọviet Yunịọn na Poland, na ọtụtụ nkwekọrịta ndị ọzọ, ma nke dị n'etiti mba abụọ, na nke dị n'etiti ọtụtụ mba.

English: His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel.
Igbo: Onye otu ya Fenando Alonso nọ n'isi ọsọ ọtụtụ mgbe, mana nke ahụ kwụsịrị mgbe ọ kwụsịrị ụgbọala ya, o nwere ike ịbụ n'ihi ụkwụ ihu ụgbọala a na-etinyeghi nke ọma.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:

English: The scenes are displayed on the pyramids and the different pyramids are lit up.
