English: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence.
Igbo: Aha niile, tinyere okwu Sie maka gị, na-ebidokarị n’iji mkpụrụ edemede ukwu, ọbụnadị n’etiti ahịrịokwu.
English: Many paleontologists today believe that one group of dinosaurs survived and is alive today. We call them birds.
Igbo: Ọtụtụ ndị ọkàchamara ihe banyere fọsịl anụmanụ na osisi taa kwenyere na otu òtù daịnosọọ lanarịrị ma dị ndụ taa. Anyị na-akpọ ha ụmụ nnụnụ.
English: This means you can visit the historic city for a couple of full days while returning and sleeping on the ship at night.
Igbo: Nke a pụtara na i nwere ike ịwere ụfọdụ ụbọchị gaa leta obodo ochie a, ma na-echighata n'ụgbọ mmiri ịrahụ ụra abalị.
English: The central authority of the church had been in Rome for over a thousand years and this concentration of power and money led many to question whether this tenet was being met.
Igbo: Ikike keetiti ahụ nke ụlọ uka anọọla n'ime Rom karịa otu puku afọ ma mkpọkọnata ike na ego a duru ọtụtụ ndị ịjụ sị ma a na-esokwa ụkpụrụ ya.
English: Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes "journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."
Igbo: Ọkachamara Pamela Ferguson nke Mahadum Dundee kwuru "ndị nta akụkọ dị ka ndị na-aga ije n'ebe dị oke egwu ma ọ bụrụ na ha ebipụta foto na ihe ndị ọzọ nke ndị a na-enyo enyo."
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
Igbo:'}]
label: Na Japan, Onye eze Emperọ haziri mmemme mkpụrụ osisi cheri izizi maka naanị ya na ndị otu ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka ọchịchị Ụlọ ikpe etiti.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.
Igbo: Ụlọ Ọrụ nke Ndị injinia nke U.S. mere atụmatụ na mmiri mmiri dị inchi isii nwere ike ịgabiga ihe mgbochi ide mmiri e mebibiri na mbụ.
English: Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.
Igbo: Ụmụ ọrịa na-efe efe n’onwe ha, ma ọ bụ ụmụ anụmanụ dị egwu nwere ike imerụ ma ọ bụ gbuo mmadụ n’ike, a na-ghị etozukarị oke dị ka ụmụ ahụhụ a na-achọghị.
English: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
Igbo: Omume okpomọkụ ha anaghị adịgide ka nnukwu ọgba dị n'ụwa nke na-enwe okpomọkụ na-anaghị agbanwe, mana ọ dị ka ndị a maka na ha bụkwa olulu miri emi n'ime ala," Glen Cushing kwuru, onye United States Geology Survey (USGS) Otu Astrojiọlọji na nke Mahadum Northern Arizona dị na Flagstaff, Arizona.
English: To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite.
Igbo: Ịhụta Họng Kọng n'ụzọ kachasị mma, pụọ n'agwaetiti gawa na Kowloon, mpaghara akụkụ mmiri, nke chere gị ihu.
English: Periodic rhythms, which are not simply responses to external periodic cues, have been documented for most living beings, including bacteria, fungi, plants, and animals.
Igbo: Usoro kwa-oge kwa-oge, nke n'abụghị nzaghachi nye ntụpenye kwa-oge keezi, ka edeturula maka ọtụtụ ihe ndị dị ndụ , nke gụnyere nje bakterịa, fọngaị, akụmakụ na ụmụanụmanụ.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Plants look their best when in a natural environment, so resist the temptation to remove even "just one" specimen.
Igbo:'}]
label: Ụmụ akụmakụ na-adị n'ụdị ha kacha mma mgbe ha nọ na gburugburu ebe obibi ekere, ya mere gbochie ọnwụnwa iwepụ ọbụna "naanị otu" ihe nlere.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.
Igbo: Onye omeiwu nakwa nwunye onyeisiala mba Argentina bụ Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner mara ọkwa na mgbede ụnyahụ na La Plata, obodo nọpụrụ kilomita 50 (maịlụ 31)site na Buenos Aires na ọ ga-eso zọọ ọkwa onyeisiala mba Argentina.
English: As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.
Igbo: Dika ebe ndị ahụ bụ ebe ndị mmadụ ebichabeghị etu ahụ, na mmetọ nke ọkụ ya mere anaghị abụkarị nsogbu, ị ga-enwekwa ike ịnụ ụtọ ụmụ kpakpando.
English: NASA's shuttle program chief N. Wayne Hale Jr. said the foam had fallen "after the time we are concerned about."
Igbo: Onye isi ihe mmemme shọtụl NASA bụ Wayne Hale Jr. kwuru na fom ahụ dara "mgbe oge anyị na-ele anya gasịrị."
English: Same goes for the military because instead of army rankings being based on class they were now based on cailaber.
Igbo: Ọ bụkwa otu ihe ahụ n'amị, maka na kama nhazi n'usoro nke ndị amị ga-adabere n'ogugo, ọ daberezie n'ikikere.
English: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France.
Igbo: N'ụbọchị Mọnde, n'ala mpịtọ dị Lyon nso nke dị n'ọwụwa anyanwụ mba Frans, ka achọpụtara na ọrịa gburu otu ọbọgwụ bụ ụdịrị ọrịa nnụnụ nke nwere ike igbu mmadụ, bụ H5N1.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: If visiting a formally arranged garden, collecting "specimens" is also going to get you ejected, without discussion.
Igbo:'}]
label: Ọ bụrụ na ị na-eleta otu ubi ahazigoro etu o kwesịrị, ị na-ewere "ụmụ ihe nlere" ga-eme ka a chụpụ gị, na-emeghị mkparịta ụka.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: These theories look at what it is about certain people that make them want the things that they do and what things in their environment will make them do or not do certain things.
Igbo: Tiori ndị a na-eleba anya n'ihe gbasara ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ nke kpatara ha ji achọ ihe ndị ha chọrọ na kedu ụmụ ihe nọ na gburugburu ebe obibi ha ga-eme ha mee ma ọ bụ emela ụfọdụ ihe.
English: Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.
Igbo: Gburugburu Medina ochie ahụ ọ dị mfe ịchọta ebe ndị na-ere ụmụ ngwaahịa ọdịnala Ndị Moroko, dị ka ụmụ tagịnị, ite akpụrụ akpụ, ngwaahịa ejiri akpụkpọ anụ mee, huuka, na giigawụ nke ụdịdị dị iche iche zuru ezu, mana ha nille bụ maka ndị nleta.
English: In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country.
Igbo: N'afọ 1994, ọgbaaghara a butere nkepụta Mba Transnistria kenkwupụta-onwe n'ime ebe ọwụwaanyanwụ Moldova, nke nwere ọchịchị na ego nke ya mana onweghi mba ọbụla so n'otu UN nabatara ya.
English: It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.
Igbo: Akara ya maka mgbututu n'ụbọchị Tuzde, mana azọpụtara ya ka ụlọ ikpe kpegharịrị ikpe na mberede.
English: The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day.
Igbo: N'otu ụbọchị ahụ, ebe elekere nke iri na abụọwepụrụ ụgbọ ahụ n'ebe ihe mbere mere.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving.
Igbo:"}]
label: Singapore bu kwanu ebe di mma ino makwa igaghari ma inwere ike igote ihe o bula i choro ma irute.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.
Igbo: Oke ifufe nke iri abụrụ aha nke oge oke ifufe Atlantik, Oke ifufe akpọrọ Jeri, gbakọrọ n'oke osimiri atlantik taa.
English: Naturalists and philosophers focused on classical texts and, in particular, on the Bible in Latin.
Igbo: Ndị ọkammụta n'ụmụ ihe ekere na ndị ọkachamara gbadoro ụkwụ n'ederede oge gboo, ọkachasị, n'akwụkwọ nsọ e dere na Latin.
English: Duty free shopping is the opportunity to buy goods exempted from taxes and excises at certain locations.
Igbo: Azụmaahịa na-enweghị ụtụ isi bụ ohere ịzụ ngwaahịa ndị ewezụgara site na ụtụ isi n’ụgwọ ndị ọzọ n’ebe ụfọdụ.
English: Reindeer husbandry is an important livelihood among the Sámi and the culture surrounding the trade is important also for many with other professions.
Igbo: Ọzụzụ Reindeer dị mkpa nke ukwuu ọkachasị n’ime ihe banyere ndụ na omenaala ndị Sámi nakwa ahịa gbara ya okirikiri dịkwa mkpa maka ọtụtụ akaọrụ ndị ọzọ.
English: Chambers, an agnostic, argues that his lawsuit is "frivolous" and "anybody can sue anybody."
Igbo: Chambers, onye na-ajụkarị oge niile, na-agbagha na ikpe ya "abaghị uru" ma "onye ọ bụla nwere ike ịkụ onye ọbụla ikpe."
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: But being placed in the "high tropics" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely).
Igbo:'}]
label: Mana ị na-edobe gị n'ime "ebe ndị na-ekpo oke ọkụ" ị ga-achọ naanị digiri ole na ole n'ugwu nke ikwuetọ imeso ma ekpomọkụ (mgbe niile) ma anwụ siri ike (mgbe elu igwe kpochara ekpocha, nke kara raa ahụ omume).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.
Igbo: Mkpebi teknụụzụ bụ usoro gazuru nchịkọta nchepụta gasị etinyere n’uju, site na technụụzụ-kwàa maọbụ nye iwu siri ike nke bụ na njedebe nke onye ga-esite n’iwu metụtara sayensi na nke ngosipụta teknụụzụ.
English: The most readily accessible plant resources would have been the proteins accessible in leaves and legumes, but these are hard for primates like us to digest unless they are cooked.
Igbo: Ihe akụrụngwa a na-enweta ngwa ngwa ga-abụrịrị protein ndị dị na akwụkwọ na legume gasị, mana ihe ndị a siri ike maka ndị nyiri mmadụ ndịọzọ bị n’ọhịa dịka anyị iji gbazèe ma anyị sie ya n’ọkụ.
English: The eathquake struck Mariana at 07:19 a.m. local time (09:19 p.m. GMT Friday).
Igbo: Ala ọma jijiji ahụ mere Mariana na 07:19 elekere ụtụtụ mpaghara (09:19 p.m. GMT Friday).
English: The Oyapock River Bridge is a cable-stayed bridge. It spans the Oyapock River to link the cities of Oiapoque in Brazil and Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock in French Guiana.
Igbo: Akwammiri Osimiri Oyapock bụ otu akwa mmiri ejiri kebùl runye ya. Ọ gbara gburugburu Osimiri Oyapock iji jikọọ ụmụ obodo nke Oiapoque n'ime Brazịl na Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock n'ime French Guiana.
English: The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.
Igbo: Ederede ahụ chọrọ nkweta steeti niile n'enweghi mgbagha tupu enwee ike imezi ha ma steeti ga weere gọọmentị etiti n'ihe efu ruo na ndị nnọchiteanya ha anaghị abịa.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: There are also a few buses going north to Hebron, the traditional burial place of the Biblical patriarchs Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, and their wives.
Igbo:"}]
label: E nwekwara ụfọdụ burumbu na-aga mgbago ugwu ruo Hebrọn, ebe ọdịnala e liri ndị nnaochie nke akwụkwọ nso bụ Ebraham, Aịzik, Jekọb, na ndị nwunye ha.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: He referred to the rumors as "political chatter and silliness".
Igbo: Ọ kpọrọ asịrị ndị ahụ "mkparịta ụka ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na nzuzu".
English: Therefore, reading this grammar primer would help you learn much about Persian grammar and understand phrases better.
Igbo: Ya bu igu akwukwo uto asusu ga enyere gi aka imuta maka uto asusu Persia makwa ghota ahiriokwu ofuma.
English: Gold may be worked into all sorts of shapes. It can be rolled into tiny shapes.
Igbo: E nwere ike ịrụpụta ọla edo n'ime ụdị ụdịdị niile. E nwere ike ịpịakọta ya n'ime ụdịdị ndị pere mpe.
English: Domestic goats were generally kept in herds that wandered on hills or other grazing areas, often tended by goatherds who were frequently children or adolescents, similar to the more widely known shepherd. These methods of herding are still used today.
Igbo: E dobere n'ozuzu ụmụ ehu ụlọ n'ime ìgwè ndị nke pagharịrị n'elu ugwu ma ọ bụ ebe ịta ahịhịa ndị ọzọ, nke ọtụtụ mgbe bụ ndị ọzụzụ ehu na-elekọta ha ndị nke na abụkarị ụmụaka ma ọ bụ ụmụ ntorọbịa, nke yiri onye ọzụzụ atụrụ a ka mara ama. A ka na-eji usoro ọzụzụ ehu ndị a ruo taa.
English: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa.
Igbo: Obodo nke Casablanca nke ugbu a bụ Berber fishermen wubere ya na BCE narị afọ nke iri, ma ndị Phoenicia, Rome, na ndị Merenid jiri ya dị ka ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri dị oke mkpa akpọrọ Anfa.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Check that the bus you are thinking of taking goes into Hebron and not just to the nearby Jewish settlement of Kiryat Arba.
Igbo:'}]
label: Lelee na bọọsụ ị na-eche maka ịbanye na ya na-aga Hebron ma ọ bụghị naanị na ebe obibi ndị Juu nke Kiryat Arba dị nso.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Wagonways were built in England as early as the 16th Century.
Igbo: E wuru ụzọ ụgbọ ibu gasị n’Ingland dị ka n'oge dị ka narị afọ nke iri na isii ahụ.
English: The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas.
Igbo: Sundabans kpuchiri ohere km² 3850, nke mmiri maọbụ ala apịtị kpuchiri otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ ya.
English: Typically there will be a tuition fee to enroll in these educational programs.

Igbo: Dunlap brọdsaịd 25 ka nọ taa bụ kọpị edemede izizi ndị kachasị dị ochie. Nke izizi e ji aka dee anọzighi.
English: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish.
Igbo: Ụmụ isi asụsụ nke Baselona bụ Katalan na Spanish. Ihe dị ka ọkara kara chọọ ịsụ Katalan, imirikiti na-aghọta ya, ma onye niile kendịnuche mara Spanish.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.
Igbo: Ka ịtụ vootu nọ na ngwụcha, pasentị iri abụọ na itolu n'ime ndị elebaara anya kwenyere na Ọstrelia kwesịrị ịbụrụ mba nọọrọ onwe ya ngwa ngwa, ebe pasentị iri atọ na otu kwenyere na Ọstrelia ekwesịghị ịbụ obodo nọọrọ onwe ya.

English: Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict.

Igbo: Nke a ga-ekwe ka ndị na-egwu egwuregwu jikwaa ihe omume na njegharị n'egwuregwu vidiyo site na imegharị ngwa ọrụ ahụ n'ikuku.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
Igbo: N'otu aka ahụ, site n’inwe otu visa Schengen, ị kwesịghịzi itinye akwụkwọ maka visa otu n’ime mba ndịòtù Schengen nke ọ bụla iche, ya mere chekwa oge, ego na mmepe akwụkwọ.
English: Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece.
Igbo: A chọtala sistemu nsi fọdụrụnụ n’ụlọ Minoan ndị dị n’obodo Crete na Santorini na Greece
English: Boating is a national pastime in Finland, with a boat to every seven or eight people.
Igbo: Akwọm ụgbọmmiri bụ ihe mmemme nchereoge na mba Finlandị, nke bụ otu ụgbọmmiri ibu mmadụ asaa maọbụ asatọ.
English: Subsistence agriculture is a simple, often organic, system using saved seed native to the ecoregion combined with crop rotation or other relatively simple techniques to maximize yield.
Igbo: Ịkọ ọrụ ugbo bụ ihe dịcha mfe, ọtụtụ mgbe nke ndụ, sistèm n'iji nkpụrụ echekwara bụ nwa afọ na mphaghara ebe obibi ahụ ejikọtara ya na nghagharị mkpụrụ ma ọ bụ usoro ndị ọzọ dị mfe iji mee ka ọmịmị kachasị.
English: The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos.
Igbo: Ezi na ebu ọrịa ahụ, nke anwụnta na ebunyezi ndị mmadụ.

English: They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.
Igbo:"}]

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
